column3: Fiɛɛ fì nu ɛ duŋcɛ beene keŋkoŋɛn ke keŋkoŋɛn nu fin fì Klistu to geɛ: Wvú to nu ɛ nya nshii we kpwe nje yese beene. Beene tɛn kɛŋke keenya wesebeene nshii nje boom bo bwee wesebeene le.

Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu wase bvù ɛkfuŋ nu ebuy eyuu ɛ́ emum enu Ŋkaw Daŋɛfey, ɛ Jisos kiɛɛ lɛ kefew kè wen nu ecinɛ woŋ wvun e, ekase egɛn fô Icee wen e nu ɛ kocɛn wase. No wvú to kooŋke bonyii bò ɛ̀ to nu bew yî woŋ wvun e, ɛ wvú koŋ bó gɛn mɛse.
Ɛ ɛ̀ nu baa bodvu bò Nyo' to ton'yɛɛ shém bô bó yî bilum e mbaanyɛ? Kɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ bó bò to geɛ bibefɛ, ke kpwekɛn ŋkpwaante jodvu le?
Ben eyuukè kɛ Nyo' le diɛwɛ boom bew e. Fo ben ebvuu egeè mwɛɛm bii nyam ye le no ben to shee gee seke ben to bɛɛ kenjiwe le kɛ.
Fiɛɛ fì nu nu lɛ, Nyo' nu ɛ lese bonyii bocii yî ncaw ɛkolɛ kè tɛmyɛɛn e, wvu lɛ ɛ̀ nɛlo ɛ́ wen ecam shen fô bó le bocii.

Ɛ me nɛ n'yuw kɛ diɛwɛ diɛw mi jemyi ɛntelɛŋ jo mwɛɛm mvu mvuyuum mvu mvunɛm mwɛ gayte lɛ, “Wee nu ke ejo nlawma wvu yî diuu le dicile sɛ guy fiŋkone fi ɛgiŋ e dvú, kɛnɛɛ ejo nlawma wvu yî diuu le dicile sɛ guy mvuŋkone mvu ɛsɛ le dvú mvuntɛntem. Geenɛn fo wo eshiw mɛɛm bô mbvuum kɛ!”
Ben eshike bikuu binɛn ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise, ɛ́ wvú ecake ben we.

Bó ekumɛn njefo wvú nu ɛ gɛɛ diuu dì wvú nu ke esaw woŋ tfuu bii kecɛɛy e. Wvú nu ɛ baa wase wee we wvù nu ke esaake. Fifin nu ɛ wvú duŋcɛ wase ɛ̂ bonyii bocii lɛ ɛ̀ nu kecɛɛy no wvú to bvusɛɛ wee wvudvu yî kpwe le.”
Ɛ bonyii bo nci le lu kefo ke bvunfon e ɛ kí nu bíay bíay bon ɛ̂ wvú ɛfa, jo ndvu bvunfon ɛ yí yɛɛle lo, shfuse yî ye le.

Nonɛn me ɛ no nteete bokɛ' bo boŋkfu le bò bɛɛ boom bo caan lɛ bó ekase egɛn etaashɛ bvujen bô bolemsɛ bomew, eboo boom, etaalè fô yéw yibole, fo wee bvuban ke enɛ ebɛɛ ɛjim jodvu ebeete bô diee disɛɛbeene.
Ben ebee me le lɛ me nu yî Icɛm e, ɛ Icɛm nu yî yɛm e. Ɛ́ ben baa bee me le nje fiɛɛ fì me ŋgayte, ɛ́ ben bee nje dilemme dì me ŋgee le.
Ɛ bó mum tfume kpwe bô woŋ boŋkfu ɛ̂ mamase yì ɛ̀ fiee ŋguy jó le. Mamase yì ɛ́ fiee ŋguy jó yin nu kpwe yi bokaŋ bofɛɛ.

Ɛ́ fifin to nu shiee le, tu Klistu be kɛŋke keekpwee jaa we, kaase kpwee ɛ kɛw no bó to bomɛɛ woŋ. Geenɛn no fí nu, nu ɛ wvú ɛ to wase kaŋ mwaaŋ fí ɛ ka lo nonɛn. Wvú to kefew kin kè woŋ kaa wase le keejo ɛkolɛ kew ege ncese dvú, ekpwe keecukɛ bibefɛ.
kuu shém bô bó, no taale kɛ fô bó le ŋkpwaante yî bilum e mbaanyɛ.
Boom bo bwɛɛm e, fí ɛ mum ɛ no nu lɛ seke ben ɛ taashɛ keedie mwɛɛm mvudien mvu Tata le, ɛ ben cɛy ɛ wee tfuu to.

Ɛ Waa Njee ke bay kelay ke bokaŋ bosoocaan, ɛ me ntaa nɛ n'yɛn ɛ nshɛ shiw bô mvuŋgay, ɛ diuu baŋke no yiile nɛn tibtibtib diɛwɛ ndvu kembamkpwe le, ɛ kpwee wvù tfule baŋke no yɛɛle nɛn buŋŋ diɛwɛ ɛlɛmɛ le.

Bomew to nu bokɛnɛ bò to lesɛɛ tɛn fitele yî Nyo' le. Ɛ Nyo' ge ɛ bonyii bobole bomew bò to nu ɛ kpwekɛn wase kase tu dvú no nu bô bó. Bomew bonyii nu ɛ bó to koole bvuuke bô bimbaŋ, ɛ bó faŋɛ yaa cim ebvuu eshieele lɛ bó ecinɛ bó le kɛ, njefo bó to yɛne lɛ ɛ́ bowen kpwe lo, ke ekase ebuy yî kpwe le ekɛŋkɛ nshii wvù jee fele wvun.

Geenɛn, ɛ Baul gay ɛ̂ bonyii bo nci le ba lɛ, “Bó se nu ɛ tam bese ya le sɛ bó nu ɛ yaw wase ɛ saw nsaw wese ŋkuuŋ, ɛ bese nu kɛ tɛn bonyii bo Lum, ɛ bvuu ɛ fen bese yew, ɛ no duu keseen lɛ bó ebvuse bese ɛjim ɛjim nɛɛ le? Kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ fí ekooy kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu ke eto kɛ bala bodvu fɛn sɛ bvuse bese.”

Bonci bo Nyo' le bò gayte lɛ, “Fo wo ejaŋ kpwɛɛ wee, fo wo eyu wee, fo wo ecoŋ bvucoŋ, fo wo edewkenè ɛjisɛ kɛ,” naa noo nci wvù la, nu ɛ bó ɛ taashɛ yî nci wvù gayte lɛ, “Ɛ̀ kooŋkè waa bwoo no wo kooŋke ɛkolɛ kuw” e.
Fí ɛ mum ɛ no nu lɛ, wee tfuu wvù taale fwe yî ye le nonɛn kɛŋke keecuke ɛkolɛ kew sekecii yuule no wvú yuule.
Ɛ̂ fitele fiem e nu ɛ me n'yuuke njoŋ bô nci Nyo' baay.
Ben eyuukè njoŋ sekecii no ben nu bonyii bo Tata le. No me ŋgay nu ɛ me mbvuu ŋkaase ntuu fó lɛ ben eyuukè njoŋ.
Ɛ me mum no mbaŋse ye keen'yɛn wee wvù jemyi ɛ̂ me le. Ɛ me ndioo mbaŋke, n'yɛn mwɛɛm mvù bó tomyi bin'yeese yî dvú le mvusooshwiy ɛ bó kene bô ketwaa ke bigew e kè yɛɛle.
Ɛ ɛ̀ bvuu nu baa bò Nyo' to lewɛɛ lɛ kɛ ɛ̀ nu naa lo ɛ́ bó ke eyuu eley bvudvuu bvuwene bvu nlɛɛtɛn e kɛ? Ɛ̀ nu kɛ bó bodvu bò to tɛmyi bikuu le?
Bonyii bocii bò to saɛ ɛ̂ me fwe to nu kɛ bocooŋ noo bonyii bò lole mwɛɛm mvuŋgay e. Nonɛn ɛ njée faŋɛ yaa eyeke fiɛɛ fì bó jemyi kɛ.
Bonyii bò lemte bomew e, ben eyuukè bonyii bò ben nu ɛ̂ bó ɛkuse le, wvumtè bó ntay. Fo ben eyuukè kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu bò nu nyɛkeey taale fô ben e kɛ. Ben ewvumtè tɛn bò befe keŋge le.
Ɛ bonyii ba bvuu to bô bonyii bomew bò eben jim nsaw mbiay, ɛ bó no teyte mwɛɛm yî Tɛfan e gayte lɛ, “Kɛ wee wvun ké no nu sɛ wvú jemyi díɛw yì befe ɛkumɛ yew ncese yin bô bonci bo Muses e kɛ.
Fin ficii nu ɛ ɛ̀ gee Nyo' wvù to kasɛɛ jo beene yî ye le no wvú to mancɛɛ mwɛɛm beene ɛ bó fele yî Klistu le. Ɛ wvú ɛ nya ɛ̂ bese lemme keegee ɛ bonyii manci mwɛɛm bô bo Nyo'.
Boom bo bwɛɛm e, ben ejo kenfewsɛn fô bonyii bo ntum e bo Nyo' le bò to ké no jemyi ɛ̂ bonyii ɛ̂ diee di Nyo' le. Bó to yɛne boŋgɛw, nu kɛ nyɛkeey.
Nonɛn, ɛ́ naa yɛɛ wvù nu ke elɛke Tata, ke eboy.’”

Bó to gee nonɛn, gayte lɛ, “Fí enù nonɛn! Mbense bô bvukukɛ noo bvufee bvu baay nu ɛ ɛ̀ kɛŋke Nyo' wese. Beene enyaà keyoone ɛ̂ wvú. Ɛ̀ kɛŋke wvú n'wvum bô mvuŋgay, ɛ wvú tɛmyi sekecii sɛ ŋka! Fí enù nonɛn.”
Fo fiɛɛ fì duŋci bvujoŋkɛ bvunɛn enù mwɛɛm mvu ye le diɛwɛ keeseyse yvuw ɛkolɛ ɛ yí jee, bô keejiise biɛɛ, noo keesuute ye bô ndvú yì jee kɛ.
Nonɛn, fo wo ewuumenè keejemyi ɛ̂ bonyii bomew ɛkumɛ Tata wesebeene kɛnɛɛ ɛkumɛ me wvù lemte ncaw nje ye kɛ. Geenɛn ɛ̀ joò tɛn wo ŋgɛw yî saaka wvù jee wvun e bô mvuŋgay mvù Nyo' nya ɛ̂ wo le.
Me ɛ mum ɛ nseyse ɛkolɛ kem ɛ ŋgɛɛ nje bó, wvu lɛ ɛ̀ nulo tɛn ɛ́ bó eseyse bibole bikuu egɛɛ yî kecɛɛy.
Ben ekamse, ebise mvuŋgay yî fiɛɛ fì shɛke nu wase tɛn diuw kpwe le. Ben ekeè lɛ me mbaa n'yɛn ɛ gee dinɛn jee gɛne mɛɛse ɛ̂ Nyo' wɛm ɛjise kɛ.
Ɛ nceendaa Nyo' wvu bokaŋ botɛte tfuw kew kentee ɛ̂ jóo yì booke le noo mondvuum mò jóo buyte mó le, ɛ yí nɛ tu ɛlɛmɛ.
Ɛ̀ ge wvú beene ɛ sɛ kɛŋkɛ je keeley mbuwma wvù beene nu yî dvú le keseen nje fitele fì beene lese yî ye le. Beene ɛ no laŋlaŋe no beene taale fwe kee lɛ beene nu ke ekɛŋkɛ fô bvukukɛ bvu Nyo' le.

Ben ekeè lo kecɛɛy lɛ kɛ wee wvù jaaŋke kenjaŋ, kɛnɛɛ wee wvù gee nnyɛn, kɛnɛɛ wee wvù yɛɛle ɛjisɛ, kɛŋke keleŋ ɛnte jo bvunfon bvu Klistu le noo bvu Nyo' le kɛ. Wee ken'yɛɛ ɛjisɛ ké no joo mwɛɛm diɛwɛ nyo' we le.

Ɛ̀ to ge tɛn fitele fì Abla'am to lesɛɛ yî Nyo' le, ɛ wvú sɛ yuw Nyo' le seke wvú to teŋɛɛ wvú lɛ wvú enɛ woŋ wvubole egɛn wvumew wvù wvú to nu keeke ekɛŋkɛ diɛwɛ woŋ we le. No Abla'am yuwɛɛ nonɛn mum no gɛne kɛ lo, yaa cim kee fô wvú gɛne kɛ.
Fo ben ewuù mbvuum ɛ mó koole ben kɛ. Fifin nu fiɛɛ fì beete lo bô bonyii. Ben enù ɛ ben ɛ yiŋsɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô Keyoy ke Yuule.
Bonyii nteen nu ke ebeŋɛn nce wvubo nnyɛn e, ɛ́ fifin ege ɛ́ bonyii ejemyi díɛw yì befe ɛkumɛ je yi kecɛɛy.
Ɛ̀ ge wvú beene bocii ɛ sɛ kɛŋkɛ je keeto fô Nyo' Ice le fele yî Keyoy e kemwaaŋ.

Fi ɛkumɛ bonyii bo mbee le bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu nu ɛ bese to jo ntaŋ saŋ ŋwa' ciinse fô bó le lɛ fo bó edieè mwɛɛm mvudien mvù bó nu ɛ ge bintaŋe dvú fô bonyo' le kɛ. Fo bó edieè ɛlɛmɛ ke nyam e kɛ. Fo bó edieè nyam yì nu sɛ bó sɛle lo ɛlɛmɛ ɛ buy kɛ. Fo bó ekɛŋkè fiɛɛ keege bô kenjaŋ kɛ.”
No wvú nya nonɛn, ɛ Bita bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ananias, ɛ̀ ge la fì wo cine Satan ɛ ley ɛ̂ fitele fiuw e ɛ ge lɛ wo embiay mbiay ɛ̂ Keyoy ke Yuule, wo ɛ mum ɛ fafe bigew bì wo gese wɛɛ dvú?

Nonɛn, beene saa ebvuu enu kɛ diɛwɛ boom bo caan e, bò kfuu n'yɛɛyi wvù la dioo fele no njiŋsene bô bó ɛ bó gɛne fwe tuu jim kɛ diɛwɛ fiɛɛ fò fwefwe kale le kɛ. Beene saa ebvuu enu tɛn diɛwɛ bonyii bò bonyii bò ghane wɛɛntene lo elɛɛle bó bô mbiay yì bó seyse le kɛ.

Kɛ ben kee lɛ kɛ bonyii bò gee mwɛɛm mvù befe yaa nu ke ekɛŋkɛ bvudvuu ɛnte jo bvunfon bvu Nyo' le le? Fo ben elɛɛlè bikuu binɛn kɛ. Kɛ bonyii bò jaaŋke kenjaŋ, kɛnɛɛ bò bunlee bonyo' bo ɛcici, kɛnɛɛ bò jaaŋke bokɛ' bo bonyii bomew e, kɛnɛɛ bolemsɛ bò kaase joo bomew, kɛnɛɛ bokɛnɛ bò kaase joo bomew,

Fo beene ecin'yì keetoo yî kentaashɛ le diɛwɛ no bonyii bomew nu ɛ nɛ wase ɛ no gee kɛ. Beene eyvuwsè lo mvuntelem mvusɛɛbeene, ɛfey mvunciim no beene yɛne wase ɛ diuu dì Tata wesebeene nu ke ekase eto nu wase nceencee.

Fí ɛ mum ɛ no nu lɛ, ben elɛse lo mwɛɛm diɛwɛ mvun e mvù nyam ye shieele. Ɛ̀ nu keejaaŋke kenjaŋ bô keekpwawci mwɛɛm ɛkumɛ kenjaŋ, noo ye yì ŋɛyɛɛn, noo keeshieele keegee mwɛɛm mvù befe, noo keebvuushi ɛjisɛ yî mwɛɛm e. Wee wvù bvuushi ɛjisɛ yî mwɛɛm e nu ɛ mwɛɛm mvun ɛ tu wase nyo' mvu fô wvú le.

Geenɛn no beene nu fisɛɛbeene ɛ ɛ̀ nu bonyii bo ɛmvunsheeŋ, beene emum enù bô bvufee bvusɛɛbeene fó bvucii. Beene ejo mbee bô keŋkoŋɛn ɛ́ mvú enù diɛwɛ ketwaa ke jem e ɛ beene ɛ jise ɛ baŋ gvúw yesebeene dvú, ejo tɛn mboyma wvù beene taale fwe yî dvú le ɛ́ wvú enù diɛwɛ kefo ke jem e ɛ beene ɛ bon.

Ɛ̀ keè lɛ Nyo' to baa nya keyoy ɛ̂ beene ɛ ɛ̀ nu kè egee ɛ beene kɛŋke nfan kɛ. Wvú to nya ɛ ɛ̀ nu keyoy ke mvuŋgay e bô ke keŋkoŋɛn e noo kè nulo ege ɛ́ beene ekeè keekemsene bô bikuu bisɛɛbeene.
Wee wvù duu lɛ wen kee Nyo', geenɛn yaa gɛɛle bonci bew kɛ, nu wee mbiay, ɛ kecɛɛy yaa nu yî ye le kɛ.
No fí nu nonɛn, ben ege lɛ ɛ́ me emɛse en'yuw njoŋ. Ben enù diuw mwaaŋ, kooŋkè bikuu binɛn, kɛŋkè fitele fimwaaŋ bvuu kɛŋkè ŋkpwawcɛ mwaaŋ.
No wvú jeme nonɛn, ɛ bonyii bomew mum no gomte keekoo wvú. Geenɛn ɛ wee faŋɛ yaa kum wvú le kɛ, njefo kefew kew to baa to wase ekocɛn kɛ.
Bó egeè ɛ ɛ̀ nu mwɛɛm mvù jee, ɛ́ kpwaw wvubo enù mwɛɛm mvù jee mvù bó gee. Bó eyene can yibo enyaa nnya yaa taale kɛ.
Ɛ bó tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ́ wee wvun be baa buw fiɛɛ, tu bese baa too bô wvú keenya ɛ̂ wo kɛ.”

Wee wvù joo lɛ ɛdiuw yomew nu yo baay baay gee nonɛn keenya n'wvum ɛ̂ Tata. Ɛ wee wvù diee fiɛɛ ficii diee tɛn keenya n'wvum ɛ̂ Tata, no wvú gee nonɛn no nyaa keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo'. Ɛ wee wvú nyɛnsee keediee fiɛɛ ficii nyɛnsee kɛ tɛn keenya n'wvum ɛ̂ Tata, no wvú nyaa tɛn keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo'.
Ben elaŋlaŋè yî fiɛɛ fì ben taale fwe yî dvú le kee lɛ ben nu ke ekɛŋkɛ le. Ben ekuulè shém yî boŋgɛw e. Ben enù yî bunle le sekecii.
Ɛ wvú mum gay lɛ ɛkolɛ ke ŋgoo mi bonyii bo nci le ejo Baul egɛn elese yew, ecɛytè. Geenɛn, lɛ bó enya kɛ naa wvú bô je, ecinɛ ɛ́ nsáa ye etoo fici wvú.
Kɛ wee wvù kɛŋke keŋkoŋɛn ké no yɛne jay wee mvu le kɛ. Wvú ké no fiisene mwɛɛm mvunciim, taale kɛ fwe yî fiɛɛ le ficii, bvuu suule shém yî fiɛɛ le ficii.
No bese nu ɛ lese fitele yî Nyo' le diɛwɛ wee mvu wvù to jemyɛɛ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' le lɛ, “Me nu ɛ mbee ɛ nsɛ no njemyi”, nu ɛ bese tɛn ɛ bee ɛ sɛ no jemyi.
Bese bvuu lɛke tɛn ben boom bo bwee wese le lɛ ben etefe bonyii bò nu laame kɛ lo, eyvuwsɛ mvuntelem mvu bonyii bò kɛŋke jaŋ e, eficɛ tɛn bonyii bò wɛɛyi. Ben ekuulè shém ben ɛ bonyii bocii.
Ɛ nceendaa Nyo' wvu bokaŋ botin tfuw kew kentee ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî kawla nyam yì bɛmte yɛ le, ɛ woŋ wvù nyam yidvu to saake nɛ jiim lo. Ɛ bonyii no nu yî monlum e lumyi ɛlem ɛbo.
Kembonɛn ke Nyo' le bô shen ye eto fô bonyii bocii bò bii je yin e, bò nu wase bonyii bo Islael bo Nyo' le.
Bó to nu ɛ yɛɛyi wase wvú bô Je yì Tata duŋci, ɛ wvú mum no fiee lo bô n'yɛɛyi wvu ɛkumɛ Jisos, yɛɛyi bonyii lɛŋ. Geenɛn, wvú to kee kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì Jon to fewci leese bonyii ɛ̂ joo.
Me ɛ mum ɛ no nduu fiem lɛ fiɛɛ ficii fì wee gee, kɛnɛɛ wvú diee ɛ ɛ̀ nu fidien, kɛnɛɛ wvú wuu ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiwuun, ɛ wvú no gee ɛ̂ je yì wee mvu yɛn lo, enyaà mbense ɛ̂ Nyo' le.

Geenɛn n'yefe wvù ben to kɛŋkɛɛ ɛ̂ Klistu nu sekecii yî yene le, ɛ ben yaa bvuu shieele lo wee mvu wvù ebvuu eyɛɛyi ben kɛ. No n'yefe we wvun yɛɛyi wase ben ɛkumɛ mwɛɛm mvunciim, ɛ n'yefe wvudvu nu wvu kecɛɛy, sɛ ɛ̀ nu wvu mbiay, ben emum enù sekecii yî Klistu le kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no n'yefe wvun nu ɛ yɛɛyi ben.
Fí ɛ no nu lɛ, kɛ no keyoy cin'yi nyam ye le ɛ yí mum no nu wase fiɛɛ fi ɛcici, nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no wee lese fitele yî Nyo' le sɛ gee di lɛŋ ŋkuuŋ tu fí nu ɛcici.
No wvú jeme nonɛn, mum jo blɛɛd, nya keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo', guse no diee ɛ̂ bonyii bocii ɛjise.

Beene esaŋ kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu ŋwa' fô bó le, egay lɛ fo bó edieè mwɛɛm mvù bonyii nu ɛ ge bintaŋe dvú fô bonyo' le kɛ, njefo ɛ̀ nu mwɛɛm mvu nnyɛn e. Fo bó ekɛŋkè fiɛɛ keege bô kenjaŋ kɛ. Fo bó edieè nyam yì nu sɛ bó sɛle lo ɛlɛmɛ ɛ buy kɛ. Fo bó edieè ɛlɛmɛ ke nyam e kɛ.
Ɛ Baul tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Nyo' nu ke ekfun tɛn wo. Wo fieesene kembew kè bó nu ɛ yefe kí ɛ no baa. Wo shile fɛ lɛ wo saake me bii nci le, ɛ bvuu ɛ no ŋgoyte nci wvudvu gayte lɛ bó ekfun me le?”
Fí ɛ mum ɛ no nu lɛ, keseen nu ɛ kɛ wee wvù nu ɛ taashɛ wase bô Klistu Jisos bɛɛ ke ebvuu eley ŋgɛw e kɛ.
Ben ekeè lɛ kɛ Nyo' to caw beene gɛɛ lɛ wen ke eduŋcɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu shém ye yì ffuuke ɛ̂ beene kɛ. Wvú to caw lɛ beene ke ekɛŋkɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu mboyma fele yî Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos Klistu le.

ɛ́ wvú emum ebuy eto eghane lɛɛle bitum bicii bì nu yî ɛbuw ɛ woŋ yo ɛna le. Bitum bin nu Gog bô Magog. Wvú nu ke ebaancɛ bó ɛ́ bó eseyse keetum jem. Bó nu ke elone lo diɛwɛ monshɛɛm mo ɛ̂ joo yi baay e.

Mwɛɛm mvun nu mvù ben bomew to gee fwele. Geenɛn, ɛ Nyo' ke cukɛ ben, caw gɛɛ, ɛ ben no nu teytey ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise. Wvú to ge mwɛɛm mvun bô mvuŋgay mvu diee di Tata Jisos Klistu le bô mvu Keyoy kew ke wvú wvù Nyo' wesebeene le.

Ɛ̀ nu nje fifin wvù me n'yɛne ŋgɛw wvù me n'yɛne wvun nɛn. Geenɛn kɛ me ŋ'wuumene kɛ, njefo me ŋkee wee wvù me nu ɛ nlese fitele yî ye le. Ɛ me ŋkee lo sɛ kemaŋɛn lɛ wvú nulo etaale kɛ fô fiɛɛ fì me nu ɛ nya can ye le fin e, egɛn buy diuu di fokemɛse le.

Yî fiɛɛ le ficii, ɛ́ ben ebunleè sekecii bii no Keyoy ke Yuule duŋci. Ben dioo bunlee no biite fiɛɛ ficii fì ben shieele ɛ̂ Nyo'. Yî fifiɛ le ɛ́ ben etaalè ntay, ebvuu ekuulè shém sekecii keebunlee lɛke Nyo' fô bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo Nyo' le bocii.

Ɛ̀ nu me wvù Baul, ɛ me nu bee Silas noo Timatio. Me nsaaŋke ŋwa' wvun fô kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le ke Tɛsalonika le kè nu ɛ taashɛ ɛ no nu yî Nyo' Ice bô Tata Jisos Klistu le. Mbuwma Nyo' bô nyɛkeey enù fô ben e.
Ben eduŋcì gee di nyɛkeey ɛ̂ wee tfuu, ekumyì lɛ kefew kè Tata nu ke ekase eto nu wase nceencee.
Fí ɛ mum ɛ no nu lɛ ɛ gɛn naa ɛ buy seke Tata nu ke ekase eto le, nu ɛ sekecii kè ben diee blɛɛd wvun bvuu wuu fiko fin nu ɛ ben fewci ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛkumɛ kpwe Tata.
ɛ́ bunle yidvu yì bó bunlee ɛ bó ɛ lese fitele yî Tata le, efi wvú ɛ́ wvú ebonɛn, ɛ́ Nyo' ecake wvú we. Ɛ́ ɛ̀ fɛn nu ɛ wee wvudvu ɛ ge kebefɛ, ɛ́ Nyo' elɛɛshɛ enya ɛ̂ wvú.
Me ŋké ŋkumyi wo sekecii ɛ̂ bunle yɛm e no nyaa kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo' wvù me nlemte wvú le ɛ fiɛɛ yaa saake me fô fitele le kɛ no bo'icɛm to lemte.
Ɛ bó nyiimene nonɛn, fuuŋke ɛ̂ dikum bô bimbaan gayte lɛ, “Ben egbwekɛn yî yese le, ebaŋyɛ bese fo wee wɛ wvù nu ɛ shii yî kawla le eyɛne bese le bô fo Waa Njee eduŋcɛ shém ye yì ffuuke yî yese le.

Wee wvù kɛŋke bitem, ɛ wvú yuw fiɛɛ fì Keyoy ke Nyo' le jemyi ɛ̂ bintaashɛ bi bonyii bo mbee le. Wee wvù ɛ ke ɛ so nu ɛ me nu ŋke enjo fô mana wvù bó to nyilɛɛ le enya wvú dvú, embvuu enya wvú tɛ dì baa ɛ bó ɛ saŋ diee di difɛ yî dvú le ɛ wee yaa nu dvú wvù kee diee didvu ɛfey wee wvù fi tɛ didvu kɛ.’”
Ken'yɛɛ ɛjisɛ ke mwɛɛm e nu ke ege ɛ́ bó efii mwɛɛm can yene le bô binfɛ bi mbiay e bì bó nu ɛ seyse. Bonyii bodvu ban nu ɛ Nyo' to seyse wase ŋgɛw wvubo ɛ ɛ̀ bɛɛ lo, ɛ wvú nu kɛ fó cɛyte bó.
No bó baa kooŋke kecɛɛy nonɛn, Nyo' ɛ mum ɛ ge bó ɛ no looci jeeŋke lo wvu lɛ bó ebeŋe kɛ wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì nu fi mbiay e.
Ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì bó nu ɛ saŋ lɛ, “Bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu ké no beete bô diee di Nyo' le ɛ ɛ̀ ge gee dinɛn ben Bojuu.”
No Janis bô Jambles to kicine Muses, nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no bonyii ban kicine kecɛɛy ke Nyo' le. Ɛ̀ nu bonyii ɛ bvufee bvubole ɛ lɛmlɛm wase, ɛ fitele fì bó duu lɛ bó nu ɛ lese yî Klistu le nu mbiay.
Bonyii bò me ŋkooŋke nu ɛ me ŋké nsaw bó yî gee dibole, nya ŋgɛw ɛ̂ bó keentefe bó. Nonɛn, ben eduŋcɛ shiee ekumɛn mvuntelem mvunɛn.
Keseen no Nyo' nu ɛ jo wase beene lɛ beene nu sɛ jay nje fitele fì beene lese yî ye le, beene ɛ mum ɛ no nu yî nyɛkeey e beene ɛ bó nje fiɛɛ fì Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos Klistu ge.
Ɛ̀ yɛnè bô ɛkolɛ kuw noo bô n'yɛɛyi wo. Ɛ̀ jici dvú ntay wvu lɛ no wo gee nonɛn, ɛ́ wo ke eboyse ɛkolɛ kuw, eboyse tɛn noo bonyii bò yuuke fiɛɛ fì wo jemyi.

Me nto nyaa ŋgɛw ɛ̂ bó ɛfonɛfon yéw bunle le yicii, ŋkane lɛ bó ejemyi díɛw yì befe ɛkumɛ wee wvù Jisos. Ɛ shém ffuuke me bô bó baay, ɛ me mbone bikaa ɛ̂ bó ɛjim, ŋgɛne mbuyte bilaante bi bitum bimew e.
Mwɛɛm mvù nyam ye ké no shieele nu ɛ bonyii yaa maa mvú kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu keejaaŋke kenjaŋ bô keekpwawci mwɛɛm ɛkumɛ kenjaŋ noo keecee nce nnyɛn kenjaŋ.
Nonɛn, kɛ wee wvù jewyi ŋgow bô wee wvù fuci joo koole fiɛɛ le kɛ. Ɛ̀ mɛy Nyo' maaŋ wvù gee ɛ yí sɛ kuu.
Ben ɛ no nu keseen yaa bvuu tane nnya Nyo' mi kɛ, no ben cɛyte kefew kè Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos Klistu nu ke ekase eto ɛ́ ben eyɛn wvú le.
Ɛ me n'yuw ɛ diɛw too fowe yole diɛwɛ joo yì gbwee ɛ̂ ŋkoŋ e, dvûmte tɛn diɛwɛ jaŋ yì baykene le. Diɛw yì me n'yuwɛɛ yidvu to jemyi tɛn diɛwɛ dikome fò bonyii kumte le.
Jisos wvun nu wvù bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le bocii to jemyi ɛkumɛ wvú lɛ ɛ̀ nu naa yɛɛ wvù nu ɛ lese fitele yî ye le, ɛ́ Nyo' elɛɛshɛ bibefɛ biew fele yî diee diew e.”
Bonyii bò nu nyɛkeey, lemte lemme dì jee, gomte ɛ ɛ̀ nu bvukukɛ bô n'wvum noo nshii wvù yaa kaa kɛ, nu ɛ wvú nu ke enya nshii wvù mɛy lo ɛ̂ bó.

Ɛ̀ nu me wvù Jon, ɛ me nsaaŋke ŋwa' wvun fô bintaashɛ bi bonyii bo mbee le bi bisooshwiy bì nu ɛ̂ biba bi woŋ e bi Ɛsia le. Mbuwma bô nyɛkeey enù fô ben e wvù nɛn'yi fô Nyo' le wvù ɛ̀ nu wvuwɛ wvù nu, ɛ wvú to nu wase, ɛ wvú nu ke eto. Mbuwma bô nyɛkeey wvun enù fô ben e wvù nɛn'yi tɛn fô biyoy bi bisooshwiy bì nu fwe dvu kawla we le,
Ɛ Baul mum gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Jon to leese bonyii ɛ̂ joo, keeduŋcɛ lɛ bó nu ɛ kumɛn mvuntelem mvubole, ɛ wvú to gayte lɛ bó ebee ɛ ɛ̀ nu wee wvù too ɛ̂ wen ɛjim e, ɛ wee wvù wvú to gayte nu Jisos.”

Ɛ́ mwɛɛm mvun to nu ɛ kooy nonɛn, tu fí duŋci lɛ Tata kee keeboyse bonyii bò yuuke wvú le can ŋgɛw e, bvuu kee tɛn keegɛɛ bonyii bò cee nce wvù yaa nu kɛ wvu teytey yî ŋgɛw e, egɛn ebuy diuu di nsaw e.
Geenɛn no fí nu, nu ɛ bó to gomte ɛ ɛ̀ nu woŋ wvù fele wvuwɛ, wvù ɛ̀ nu woŋ wvu we. Nonɛn kɛ Nyo' ké no wuumene seke bó teŋe wvú lɛ Nyo' wvubo kɛ, njefo wvú nu ɛ seyse kelaante ɛ gɛɛ ɛ̂ bó.
Fo wo ekɛŋke naa lo fiɛɛ keege bô mvumaŋgaan mvu ɛcici mvù nu sɛ mvú kɛŋke fiɛɛ keege bô Nyo' kɛ. Yɛɛyɛ ɛkolɛ kuw keecee nce ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvù Nyo' gomte.
Bó nu ke ebuy elɛn egɛn yî nshɛ le egem bvudvuu bvu bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo Nyo' le bô kelaante kè ɛ̀ nu fitele fiew. Geenɛn, ŋguy nu ke eshii fowe elɛse lo bó.
No Bita bife nonɛn, mum gay lɛ bó elese bó ɛ̂ joo ɛ̂ diee di Jisos Klistu le. Ɛjim jodvu, ɛ bonyii bodvu lɛkɛ lɛ wvú ece bô bó yî ɛdiuw e caan sɛ nɛnɛ.
Ben kee naa ntay lɛ ɛ̀ nu ben bò duŋci je ɛ̂ binfefe, nu tɛn bin'yeese fô bonyii bò nu kenjiwe le,
Ɛ fiɛɛ fì Klistu nu ɛ kaw beene dvú nu nshii wvù mɛy lo.

Geenɛn, wee wvù kɛŋke bvufee bvù nɛn'yi fowe ké no yuule, kooŋke nyɛkeey bvuu nu wɛɛ, nyaa tɛn bitem ɛ̂ wee mvu, nu ɛ wvú ɛ yiŋsɛn bô shen noo gee dì jee, yaa duŋci kejɛɛy jɛɛy kɛ, yaa kɛŋke díɛw fiɛɛ kɛ.
Icee Wan nu ɛ koŋ Wan, ɛ mum ɛ nya mwɛɛm mvunciim can ye le.
Kɛ Tata guute lo ye no bonyii bomew kpwaake, keege no wvú to kawɛɛ kɛ. Wvú kuule ɛ ɛ̀ nu shém bô ben. Wvú shieele lɛ bonyii bocii ekumɛn mvuntelem mvubole njefo kɛ wvú gomte lɛ wee mvu ke ela kɛ.
Ɛ́ ɛ̀ be nu diɛwɛ me, ɛ́ me enshieele lɛ wee tfuu enu sɛ kpwoon kɛ diɛwɛ no me nu. Geenɛn, etu ege nɛɛ ɛ wee tfuu kɛŋke kɛ ye nnya yì Nyo' nu ɛ nya ɛ̂ wvú. Wee mvu kɛŋke yin nnya ɛ wee mvu kɛŋke ye.
Ben egɛɛlè keŋkoŋɛn fwe dvu mwɛɛm mvunciim, geenɛn ekɛŋkè tɛn shiee ntay fô nnyá yì Keyoy ke Yuule nyaa ɛ̂ bonyii le, ɛfey mvunciim, nnya keeteete bontum bo Nyo' le.

Nyo' wvù to gayɛɛ lɛ, “N'yuu ebuy ɛ̂ ɛjiwɛ le ebaa”, ɛ̀ nu Nyo' wvudvu wvun wvù nu ɛ ge n'yuu we ɛ no baa fô mvuntelem mvusɛse le keeyuuse bese ɛ bese kee bvukukɛ bvu Nyo' le bvù nu yî bvushiw bvu Jisos Klistu le.
Ɛ wee Juu mvu ke nɛ to Ɛfɛsus ɛ diee diew nu Abolos, ɛ bó to boke wvú Alɛksandia. Ɛ̀ to nu wee ɛ wvú kee njeme, bvuu kee Ŋwa' Nyo' ntay.
Jisos to nu ɛ kpwe tɛn ɛkfuŋ jo kelaante wvu lɛ wen ecukɛ bibefɛ bi bonyii le bô ɛlɛmɛ kew.
Mvun nu mwɛɛm mvù wo kɛŋke keeyɛɛyi bonyii dvú. Ɛ̀ teetè bó, duŋcì bojay bobole bô mvuŋgay mvunciim mvù wo kɛŋke. Fo wo ebee ɛ́ wee ejin wo kɛ.
Yin nu je yì Nyo' to duŋcɛɛ keŋkoŋɛn kew fô beene le jó: Wvú to nu ɛ tum Waa we wvù ɛ ka kɛ wvú yî woŋ wvun e wvu lɛ beene ke ekɛŋke nshii fele yî ye le.
Icɛm, me nshieele lɛ boba bò wo nu ɛ nya ɛ̂ me ke enu tɛn bee bó fô me nu, wvu lɛ bó ke eyɛn bvukukɛ bvù wo to nyaɛ ɛ̂ me nje keŋkoŋɛn kuw fô me le ɛ woŋ wvun sɛ ke kɛw e.
Bó ké no beete bô mwɛɛm, too bô ŋgɛw mondvuum monciim mò bó gɛne mó le.

Nonɛn no beene be ɛ gay wase lɛ beene kɛŋke ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le ke baay, kè ɛ̀ nu Jisos wvù Waa Nyo', ɛ wvú ɛ ben wase ɛ tosɛn ɛbulɛ ɛ gɛn fowe, beene emum ejicì mbee wvù beene ké no seŋe ɛ̂ bonyii le ntay.
Ɛ̀ to nu seke Nyo' Ice to buwɛɛ wvú bô mbense noo bvukukɛ, ɛ diɛw buy fô wvú wvù nu Nyo' Bvukukɛ le jemyi lɛ, “Wvun nu Waa wɛm, wvù nu fitele fiem. Me n'yuuke njoŋ bô wvú baay.”
Bó gee mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim ɛ ɛ̀ nyaa kɛ Keyoy kemwaaŋ nnya yidvu ɛ̂ bó. Ɛ kí gawci ɛ̂ wee tfuu no kí shieele.

Ɛ nceendaa Nyo' wvu bokaŋ bonɛw toŋ ye soŋ, ɛ fiɛɛ fimew bvuw diuu keba kemwaaŋ ɛnte jo biba bitɛte bô keba kemwaaŋ ke kpwee le ɛnte jo bitɛte. Ɛ fí bvuw tɛn jón keba kemwaaŋ ɛnte jo bitɛte. Ɛ biba bibole kemwaaŋ kemwaaŋ no jiime. Ɛ n'yuu faŋɛ yaa bvuu nu dvú ɛ̂ keba kemwaaŋ e ɛnte jo biba bitɛte ke ɛmvunsheeŋ noo ke ɛntaŋ e kɛ.
Ɛ bó bocii mum nɛ ley yî Sostɛnes wvù to nu cee ɛkolɛ yew bunle le, mum suŋ wvú fwe dvu yew nsaw. Ɛ Galio faŋɛ yaa kpwe lo fiɛɛ fó kɛ.
Ɛ Bojuu bvuu no gomte keekoo wvú, geenɛn ɛ wvú lemtɛn can yibole.
Ɛ̀ nɛɛ fiɛɛ fì kɛ shem kpwee bese kɛ. Naa no ye yese yin cim bvuuke gɛne kaa nɛn, nu ɛ mvuntelem mvusɛse kumene tuu kɛ lo mvunfɛm ɛdiuw ɛcii.

Ɛ Maalia ke mum nɛ jo fikaa fi nfiey mvu wvù shfuuŋkene le, yefe bikaa bi Jisos e dvú, sho bô yvuw ye ɛkolɛ. Nfiey wvun to lumte naa baay, ɛ bó kene bô naad ɛwvunɛwvun. No wvú yefe nonɛn, ɛ yew yidvu nɛ no shfuuŋkene lo ɛnte yicii.

Ɛ̀ to ge fitele fì wvú to lesɛɛ yî Nyo' le fidvu ɛ wvú sɛ gɛn no cee woŋ wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ wvú dvú le diɛwɛ tolo wvù nu ɛ gɛn ɛ bɛɛ woŋ bonyii bomew e. Wvú to nu jó ghane cee cún e bô bo Aysik noo Yakow bò Nyo' to kawɛɛ bó bocii bô woŋ wvudvu lɛ ɛ̀ nu ke enu wvubo.
Boom bo bwɛɛm e, ben ejoò kenfewsɛn fô me le, ebvuu etaalè tɛn nce wvù bonyii bomew cee bò nu ɛ jo kenfewsɛn fô bese le.
Ben eficì boom bo bwee wene le bô boŋgɛw bobole. Ɛ́ ben gee nonɛn tu ben gɛɛle nci Klistu.
Ben ɛ bvuu ɛ yɛn lɛ lɛ fiɛɛ fì ké ge ɛ Nyo' yɛn lɛ wee nu ɛ kocɛn wee we le nu gee diew di lɛŋ, ɛ ɛ̀ yaa mɛy kɛ fitele fì wvú lese yî Nyo' le maaŋ kɛ?
No fí nu nonɛn, ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ beene ebvuu ejeme lɛ la? Fí fɛn nu lɛ kɛ Nyo' yaa gee gee di lɛŋ e? Kɛ ɛ̀ nu nonɛn kɛ!
Ben efiisenè bonyii bo wɛɛyi yî mbee le ɛ̂ ben ɛnte. Fo ben ɛ boba bonyii ebeeke ɛ ɛ̀ nu mbew yî mwɛɛm mvù bó kpwawci lɛ ɛ̀ nu mvu lɛŋ keegee le kɛ.
Ɛ jem nɛ kɛw woŋ Nyo' le, ɛ nceendaa Nyo' wvù Maykɛl bô ŋgoo ye bonceendaa no diuu bô bo keŋguum ke nyam yì fieesene nyam joo yɛ le. Ɛ nyam yidvu bô bew bonceendaa diuu,
Ɛ́ wee ton'yi shém, ɛ́ wvú no yɛne fo wvú enɛ ege kebefɛ. Fo wvú ecinɛ ɛ́ diuu esele ɛ wvú bɛɛ ton'yi shém kɛ.

Fo wee ɛ́ ge kebefɛ bô wee, ɛ́ wvú tfuse bô kebefɛ kɛ. Ɛ́ wee nan wee, fo wvú etfuse bô ncun kɛ, ɛ wvú tfuse ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô diɛw kembonɛn. Fin nu fiɛɛ fì Nyo' teŋe ben lɛ ben egeè ɛ́ wen ke elaŋ kembonɛn yî yene le.
Wee wvù tum me nu bee wvú. Kɛ wvú baa cinɛ me le lɛ me enu me ɛmbeŋ kɛ, njefo me ŋké no ŋgee fiɛɛ sekecii ɛ ɛ̀ nu fì jee wvú le.”
Nonɛn, ben emum eleemè tɛmyi. Ben ejo kecɛɛy ɛ́ kí enu diɛwɛ kecaw e ɛ ben ɛ suu cin, ejo nce wvu teytey ɛ́ wvú enu diɛwɛ ketwaa le ɛ ben ɛ jise ɛ baŋ gvúw yene dvú.

Fiɛɛ fì jón yi yisooshwiy yɛ yì wo be yɛn ɛ̂ ɛbo kem ke ɛcɛɛy e bô mwɛɛm mvu mvusooshwiy mwɛ mvù bó kene bô ketwaa ke bigew e kè yɛɛle mvù bó tomyi bin'yeese yî dvú le duŋci nu fin: Jón yi yisooshwiy yɛ nu bonceendaa bo Nyo' le bò ɛ̀ nu bo bintaashɛ bi bonyii bo mbee le bi bisooshwiy bidvu, ɛ mwɛɛm mvu mvusooshwiy mwɛ mvù bó tomyi bin'yeese yî dvú le nu bintaashɛ bi bonyii bo mbee le bi bosooshwiy bidvu.”

Geenɛn Jisos nu wee wvù beene yɛne lɛ yî kefew e nɛn caan nu ɛ Nyo' to ge ɛ bvudvuu bwew no nu ɛkuse jo bvu bonceendaa bew e. Ɛ Nyo' ke bense wvú ɛ wvú no kɛŋke bvukukɛ bô n'wvum njefo wvú to nu ɛ yɛn ŋgɛw kpwe, wvu lɛ wvú ekpwe kpwe wee tfuu nje mbuwma wvu Nyo' fô bonyii le.
Ben ekeè lɛ ɛ̀ lemte Nyo' yî yene le, gee lɛ ben eshieelè keegee mwɛɛm mvù wvú kooŋke. Ɛ ɛ̀ bvuu nyaa wvú mvuŋgay keegee mwɛɛm mvudvu dvú.
Mwɛɛm mvun nu ɛ me njemyi ɛ̂ ben wvu lɛ njoŋ wɛm nulo enu fô ben e, ɛ́ ben emum ekɛŋke njoŋ wvù nu ɛ yiŋsɛn.
Ɛ̀ nu me wvù Baul, ɛ me nu waa ntum Klistu Jisos no Nyo' wvù Mboyse wesebeene bô Klistu Jisos wvù beene gɛke bvufee yî ye le to gayɛɛ lɛ me enù.

Me nshieele tɛn lɛ bokɛnɛ ejiisè ndvú ɛ̂ je yi lɛŋ e yì duŋci n'wvum e, noo ɛ̂ yì bonyii yɛne lɛ ɛ̀ nu yi lɛŋ e. Fo bó etuwcì bikuu kɛnɛɛ leese mwɛɛm mvù bó kene bô ketwaa ke bigew e kè yɛɛle kɛnɛɛ ɛjisɛ ɛ baŋ, kɛnɛɛ ndvú yi kenlum e kɛ.
Ɛ wvú jo bokfuu kene ŋgbwan dvú, kuŋ bó bocii dvú, kuŋ noo njée bô bona' bvuse yew ncese le. Ɛ wvú bvuu tawse bigew bi bonyii bò to kumene bigew e, baashɛ bidaŋ bibole,

Fiɛɛ fì nu, nu lɛ beene nu no bó nu nɛn, ɛ ɛ̀ lem Nyo' bô ɛbo kew. Wvú nu ɛ taashɛ beene bo Klistu Jisos ɛ ge beene ɛ no nu bonyii bo bofɛ, wvu lɛ beene elemtè dilemme dì jee dì wvú to seysɛɛ wase ɛ ɛ̀ bɛɛ lo lɛ ɛ̀ nu dì beene nu ke ecee lemte le.
Nsáa yɛm shém, fo ben ekɛŋke ŋghaw yî nton'yɛ wvù ben yuuke ye le wvù too fô ben e keemom ben kɛ. Fo fí enù kɛ diɛwɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fimew fifɛ ɛ fí kooyi bô ben kɛ.
Beene elaŋlaŋè, sakenè, nyaà mbense ɛ̂ wvú, njefo kefew ke bvujen bvu Waa Njee le nu ɛ to wase, ɛ Jen nu ɛ wvú ɛ seyse wase ɛkolɛ kew.
Ben ejo tɛn mboyma wvù Nyo' nu ɛ boyse ben ɛ́ wvú enu diɛwɛ kefo ke jem e ɛ ben ɛ bon, emum ejo tɛn nyo jem yì Keyoy ke Yuule nyaa yì ɛ̀ nu diɛw Nyo'.
Ɛ wvú dioo gɛne, yɛn ɛ wee wvu Ijiw nvuwse wee wvu Islael mvu. Ɛ wvú ley fó lɛ wen etfuse ɛnvukɛ, mum yu lo wee wvu Ijiw wvudvu.
Fô ben e, boom bo bwee wese le, fo ben ke ewɛle keegee gee dì jee kɛ.
Ben dioo nu no yɛnè. Ben eleemè tɛmyi yî mbee wene le, enù bonyii bò kɛŋke mvuntelem. Ben eleemè tɛmyi.

Ben to ghane tuule cun ɛ ɛ̀ nu yì nyo' wvù bó teŋe lɛ Molok, bvuu tuule jon ɛ bó ɛ kene lɛ ɛ̀ nu yì nyo' wvù diee nu Lefan, ɛ ɛ̀ nu mvumooso mvù ben to keencɛɛ keebunlee mvú. Nje fifin, me nu ŋke ebvuse ben ɛ́ ben ebuy egɛn efey lo Babilon.’
Nonɛn boom bo bwee wese le, ben eleemè tɛmyi, jicì nce wvù bese to nyaɛ ɛ̂ ben e, kɛnɛɛ ɛ̀ nu wvù bese to yɛɛyɛɛ lo ben dvú bô diuw, kɛnɛɛ ɛ̀ nu wvù bese to saŋɛɛ lo ɛ̂ ben.
Nyo' nu wvù nu ɛ seyse beene keekɛŋkɛ fiɛɛ fin. Wvú nu ɛ nya beene sâ' wvudvu ɛ ɛ̀ nu Keyoy ke Yuule.
Kpwoon kɛŋke keenya ɛkolɛ kew keeyeke lo n'yɛɛyi, nu diuw tfu.
Fo wee ke eyuu eshomse cee ɛkolɛ ke kentaashɛ le kemew ɛ̂ wo, ɛ́ wo emum ebee wvú le sɛ bonyii ɛ leem bofɛɛ kɛnɛɛ botɛte ɛ ben jim nsaw wvudvu kɛ.
Ben egaynɛn bikuu binɛn e, eŋocɛ ɛ̂ ŋŋocɛ bonyii bo Nyo' le. Bintaashɛ bi bonyii bo mbee le bi Klistu le bicii gayte ben e.

Bó nu ke ekfumte kebvu ɛfa no bó fuuŋke kpwe soo bikuu, beele ghayte lɛ, ‘Ɛy me! Ɛy me! Yii yi baay fô kelaante ke baay kin kè bonyii bocii bò kɛŋke boŋguw bo ɛ̂ joo nu ɛ kukɛn yî bvukukɛ bwew e! Bó nu ɛ mum ɛ yɛse lo kí kɛ yî ntam kefew e nɛn mwaaŋ e?’

Ben etaa kɛ eyɛn kfuu keŋkoŋɛn ke baay kè Nyo' Ice nu ɛ duŋcɛ fô beene le, ɛ ge lɛ bó eteŋe beene lɛ boom bo Nyo' le! Ɛ beene nu kecɛɛy boom bo Nyo' le. Fiɛɛ fì bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo yî woŋ wvun e baa kee beene nu njefo bó baa kee tɛn wvú wvù Nyo' kɛ.

Me ɛ no njemyi tɛn ɛ̂ keghan lɛ, ben eyuukè bocee kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le ntay. Wee tfuu eshiwsè ɛkolɛ kew ɛ̂ waa bwee fwe sekecii. Ben ekeè lɛ, “Kɛ Nyo' ké no tomte wee wvù bensee ye kɛ. Wvú ké no tomte ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvù shiwse ɛkolɛ kew bô mbuwma we.”

Kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ fí ekooy nonɛn kɛ! Naa no bonyii bocii cim nu naa bo mbiay e, nu ɛ Nyo' leeme kɛ yî kecɛɛy e, no bó nu ɛ saŋ lɛ, “Nyo', wo dioo jemyi, ɛ njeme wo no nu kɛ wvu lɛŋ. Ɛ wo ké no soo kɛ lo nsaw wo.”
Ɛ wvú too nɛn, ɛ wvú ɛ fi mvuŋgay ɛ̂ bocee ncese bo baay baay, lɛ wen eto ekooyɛ bonyii bocii jan bò bunle teŋe diee diuw.”

Kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no bonyii bomew to nu dvú fwele ɛ̂ bonyii ɛntelɛŋ bò to mbiayte lɛ ɛ̀ tum Nyo' bó, ɛ̀ nu kɛ tɛn no bonyii bo n'yɛɛyi le bo mbiay e nu enù ɛ̂ ben ɛntelɛŋ. Bó nu ke ewɛɛntɛn eto bô n'yɛɛyi mvu wvù nulo ebefe bô bonyii, elese ɛ̂ diɛw Nyo' le emum emaa naa lo Cee Ɛkolɛ wvù to kpweɛ keesum bó. Bó nu ke ege nonɛn emum eto lo bô ŋgɛw kaŋ mwaaŋ elaŋ yî bikuu bibole.
Ɛ njeme wvun ge ɛ Bojuu mɛse lo no gomte baay keeyu wvú, njefo kɛ ɛ̀ to mɛy kɛ mbam wvù wvú to ŋgoyte maaŋ kɛ. Wvú to teŋe tɛn Nyo' lɛ Icee wen, fewsene ɛkolɛ kew lɛ wen nu lɛŋlɛŋ bô Nyo'.
Me mbɛnsee ben no ben kumyi me yî fiɛɛ ficii le bvuu bii mwɛɛm mvù me nto n'yɛɛyɛɛ ben dvú.
Dawe to nu ɛ jeme ɛkumɛ Jisos wvun gayte lɛ, ‘Me n'yɛne Tata Nyo' le ɛ wvú nu bee wvú sekecii ɛ̂ ɛbo kem ke ɛcɛɛy e, ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nulo ɛ́ fiɛɛ eshiw me kɛ.

Ben ekoŋenè nonɛn, njefo bó nu ɛ kase wase ɛ boo ben ɛ̂ mboo wvu fwɛ le. Kɛ wee wvù boke ben wvun nu wvù nulo ekpwe kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu Nyo' kebɛɛ ɛ wvú yaa nulo ekpwe kɛ. Wvú to boke ben ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô diɛw ye yì nyaa nshii. Ɛ diɛw yin nu ke emɛy kɛ eleeme fó.
Nonɛn, fí ɛ̀ no nu lɛ, ɛ́ wee ge fiɛɛ fì befe, ɛ́ wvú see ɛ̂ waa bwee, ɛ́ wee ebunle fô wee noo wee le, wvu lɛ Nyo' efɛ ben. Bunle wee wvu teytey kɛŋke mvuŋgay baay gee mwɛɛm nteen.
Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy kecɛɛy lɛ, wee wvù nu ɛ bee nu ɛ wvú kɛŋke wase nshii wvù mɛy lo.
Kɛ me nu ŋke encinɛ ben e ɛ́ ben enu diɛwɛ boom bo boŋkfu le kɛ. Me nu ŋke eŋkase ento enu beene.
'Ɛɛ, Bojuu fele naa bonyii bomew ɛ̂ jé le nteen. Fi baay nu lɛ Nyo' to nu ɛ nya diɛw ye ɛ ɛ̀ nu can yibole.
Ben bò nu bonfaw, ben eyuukè bonyii bò kɛŋke ben yî nshɛ le fɛn e, ben efanè bó bvuu wvumtè bó. Ben eyuukè bó le bô mvuntelem mvunɛn mvunciim no ben yuuke Klistu le.
Nuu lɛ kɛ wo yɛne lɛ Nyo' kɛŋke fitele fì jee fô bonyii le baay, kuule shém baay, nu tɛn nyɛkeey baay ɛ? Ɛ̀ keè lɛ fitele fì jee fi Nyo' le fô wo le duŋci lɛ wo ekumɛn fitele fiuw.
Kɛ beene yaa kɛŋke nfan keebencɛ egɛn fwe dvu Nyo' elɛkɛ fiɛɛ ɛ̂ wvú kɛ, njefo ɛ́ beene lɛke fiɛɛ ɛ̂ wvú bii no wvú shieele, ɛ́ wvú eyuw fiɛɛ fì beene jemyi.

Me nlɛke lɛ Nyo' wvù beene taale fwe yî ye le, eyiŋsɛn mvuntelem mvunɛn bô njoŋ noo nyɛkeey no ben nu ɛ lese fitele yî ye le, wvu lɛ ɛ̂ mvuŋgay mvu Keyoy ke Yuule le, ɛ́ ben etaale kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu fwe sekecii yî fiɛɛ fì ben kee lɛ ben nu ke ekɛŋkɛ le.
Ɛ̀ to nu ɛ wɛɛ kentaaŋ wvumew nu mbew fò bó to taɛ Jisos yî kentam e. Ɛ wɛɛ wvudvu nu ɛ jem yi fiɛ mi nu dvú ɛ bó ke baa edwey wase wee jó kɛ.

Ɛ jem kɛw, ɛ wvú koo nyam yì bɛmte yɛ bô wee wvù to mbiayte lɛ wen nu wee ntum Nyo'. Wee wvun nu wvù to ké no shee fwe dvu nyam yidvu, gee mwɛɛm mvu diuw wvù yumɛɛn e. Mwɛɛm mvun nu mvù yí to lɛɛle bonyii bò kɛŋke nciise nyam yì bɛmte yidvu ye le dvú, nyaa mbense wvu baay ɛ̂ laŋ nyam yì bɛmte yidvu. Wvú to nu ɛ tfume bó bofɛɛ ban ɛ bó nu boyuum ɛ̂ mamase yì ɛ̀ fiee ŋguy bô mvuŋkaŋ jó le.

Fì ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ben egeè nu fin fì bó saŋ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le lɛ, “Ɛ́ jeŋ yuu wee wo bvuban, ɛ́ wo nya fiɛɛ ɛ wvú die. Kendoŋ ɛ́ no yumte wvú, ɛ́ wo nya fiɛɛ ɛ wvú wu. Ɛ́ wo ge nonɛn, ɛ́ ken'wuumɛn enu fô wvú ɛfa.”

Ben egɛɛ ɛ́ saaka wvu ɛkumɛ Klistu enù ɛ̂ mvuntelem mvunɛn e naa ntay, ɛ́ ben eyɛɛyi bvuu teete bikuu binɛn bô bvufee bvucii. Ben eyemtè benseè Nyo' bô njoŋ fô mvuntelem mvunɛn e bô boŋkiee bò buyte ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Mbense le noo boŋkiee bomew bo mbense le, noo bò Keyoy kew nyaa ɛ̂ bonyii.
Bolemsɛ, ben ekooŋkè bokɛ' bonɛn. Fo ben eŋasene yî bó le kɛ.

Ɛ́ kpwoon wvù ɛ̀ nu wee mbee kɛŋke bokɛ' bo boŋkfu le ɛ̂ kfuu dibole, ɛ́ wvú nu fici bó, wvu lɛ fo kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le etuule bvujitɛ kɛ. Ɛ́ kí efici wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu bokɛ' bo boŋkfu le bò looci nu ɛbonɛbon.
Njeme Nyo' wvun nu lɛ Nyo' nu ɛ nya beene bô nshii wvù mɛy lo, ɛ nshii wvun nɛn'yi yî Waa we le.
Wee wvù kɛŋke Waa Nyo' yî ye le kɛŋke nshii wvudvu, ɛ wee wvù baa kɛŋke Waa Nyo' yî ye le yaa kɛŋke nshii wvudvu kɛ.
Nonɛn, ɛ́ Waa Nyo' bvuse ben yî bvunfaw e, tu ben nu ɛ buy wase bvú le kecɛɛy.
No fí nu nonɛn, me ɛ mum ɛ no ŋkule lo can lɛ fo shem kpwe ben nje ŋgɛw wvù me n'yɛne fô ben e kɛ. Ben nu ke ekɛŋkɛ bvujoŋkɛ bvudvu.
Ben ekeè lɛ kɛ boba bonyii yaa lemte ɛ ɛ̀ nu Tata wesebeene wvù Klistu le kɛ. Bó lemte ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô ɛtew ɛbole. Bó joo njeme wvù yeke wvù ɛ̀ nu wvu kenlɛɛma lɛɛle bonyii bò nu sɛ bó kee fiɛɛ dvú.

Mvuntelem mvubole ɛ mum ɛ no nu ɛ mvú ɛ yiŋsɛn bô mwɛɛm mvù befe jɛɛy jɛɛy. Bó buwyi mwɛɛm, dewkene ɛjisɛ, kɛŋke mvuntelem mvù befe, bene bindoŋ bô bonyii, yuwyi bonyii, diuu bvudiuw, lɛɛle kenlɛɛma, ŋgomgome bô mwɛɛm, kunsene mvuŋkunsɛn,
Ɛ̀ jicì n'yɛɛyi wvu kecɛɛy e wvù bó to nyaɛ can yo le. Ɛ̀ jicì bô mvuŋgay mvu Keyoy ke Yuule le kè nu yî yese beene le.

Ɛ́ wee jewe ye ŋgow ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì nyam ye ye gomte, tu wvú nu ke egbwele kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì nyam ye ye nyaa fì ɛ̀ nu kpwe. Ɛ́ wee jewe ye ŋgow ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì Keyoy ke Nyo' le gomte, tu wvú nu ke egbwele nshii wvù mɛy lo wvù Keyoy ke Nyo' le nyaa.
Fo beene emomtè Tata no bó bomew to momte, ɛ Nyo' ge ɛ yó tawyɛ bonyii bodvu ɛ bó kpwekɛn kɛ.
Kɛ wvú ké no ŋasene yî bonyii le kɛ. Kɛ wvú ké no kpwaake kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛkolɛ kew kɛ. Kɛ wvú ké ton'yɛ shém cekey kɛ. Ɛ kɛ wvú ké no gɛɛle wee fô fitele le kɛ.
Yí to kɛŋke ŋgáw ɛ yí nu diɛwɛ ketwaa kè bonyii bo jem e baŋyi gvúw dvú. Ɛ́ yí dioo bile ɛ bibɛ bibole no yole diɛwɛ bikoto nteen bì ɛ̀ guute nyámbala seke bí lewte gbwen jem e.
Ɛ́ ɛ̀ be baa nu lɛ me nu ɛ nto ɛ njeme ɛ̂ bó, tu bó be baa ekɛŋke jay kɛ. Geenɛn, keseen nu ɛ kɛ bó kɛŋke fiɛɛ keetaŋe diuw dvú yî bibefɛ bibole kɛ.
Ben dioo nu ben ɛ bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ bo mbee le no gee mwɛɛm bô bvufee. Seke ben ɛ kɛŋke je keege fiɛɛ, ɛ ben mom lɛ fo kefew kedvu efey ɛcici kɛ.

Beene kee lɛ ye yesebeene yì ɛ̀ nu nce wvu yvum nu ɛ bó to ta wase yî kentam e beene ɛ bo Klistu, wvu lɛ bó efiwsɛ lo ye yidvu yì ɛ̀ nu yi kebefɛ, lɛ ɛ̀ nɛlo ɛ́ beene saa ebvuu enu bonfaw can kebefɛ le kɛ,
Fiɛɛ fì nulo ege ɛ́ beene eyɛne bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu boom bo Nyo' le bô bò ɛ̀ nu bo dɛwle le nu fin: Wee tfuu wvù nu sɛ wvú gee mwɛɛm teytey kɛnɛɛ wvù nu sɛ wvú kooŋke waa bwee, yaa nu Waa Nyo' kɛ.
No fí nu nonɛn wee wvù leke bvufee ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî mwɛɛm mvù nyam ye gomte le ké no bane Nyo'. Kɛ wvuwɛ wee ké no yuuke nci Nyo' le kɛ. Ɛ ɛ̀ nu kecɛɛy lɛ kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wvú eyuuke kɛ.
Nonɛn, fitele fiem ɛ mum ɛ no yuuke njoŋ, ɛ me njemyi bô nlaŋlaŋ. Me nu wee ɛ me nu ŋke eŋkpwe kɛ lo, geenɛn ɛ me ntaale kɛ fwe,

Kɛ ɛ̀ nu nonɛn kɛ. Fiɛɛ fì me ŋgayte nu lɛ boncese bò bonyii bò yaa kee kɛ Nyo' gee nu ɛ bó gee ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô bonceendaa bo dɛwle le. Kɛ bó gee ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô Nyo' le kɛ. Me ɛ no ŋgayte lɛ fo ben etaashì ben ɛ bonceendaa bo dɛwle le kɛ.

Bonyii bomew to nu ɛ̂ kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le Antiok, ɛ ɛ̀ nu bò seŋe mwɛɛm mvù bó yuuke ɛ Nyo' jemyi, bvuu yɛɛyi bonyii. Bonyii bodvu to nu Banaban bô Semeon wvù bó to teŋe lɛ Wvù Yiile, noo Lushus wvu Sɛlin bô Saul noo Manɛɛn wvù bó to lɛyɛɛ wvú bô 'Ɛlod wvù wee sa'.
Fo ben ebee ɛ́ wee elɛɛ ben bô njeme wvu ɛcici ɛkumɛ mwɛɛm mvun kɛ. Ben ekeè lɛ ɛ̀ nu mwɛɛm mvudvu mvun mvù ké ge ɛ shém Nyo' no ffuuke bô bonyii bò yaa yuuke wvú le kɛ.
Boban nu bonyii bò bó ebaŋ lo dew yibo, njefo bó ghane bvuŋse yéw bonyii yicii no bó yɛɛyi mwɛɛm mvù bó yaa kɛŋke keeyɛɛyi kɛ. Ɛ bó gee nonɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu nje bigew bi ɛcici bì bó kuuŋke.
Jisos to jemyi nonɛn njefo wvú to kee wase wee wvù nu ke egese wvú. Ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì wvú to gayɛɛ lɛ, “Kɛ ben yuule bocii kɛ.”

“Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy kecɛɛy lɛ, ɛ́ wee leyte ɛ̂ ketaaŋ ke njée le, ɛ faŋɛ yaa eley ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô diuw ketaaŋ e, ɛ ben lo yî ketaaŋ e ɛ sɛ ley, tu wvuwɛ wee nu cooŋ, nu wee wvù lole mwɛɛm mvuŋgay e.
Bó nu ɛ cinɛ wase je yi lɛŋ e ɛ jo ɛ ɛ̀ nu yi ɛcici. Bó nu ɛ jo ɛkalɛ ke Balaam wvù waa Bɛwu le wvù to nu ɛ bee keege fiɛɛ fì yaa nu kɛ lɛŋ nje wvú to kooŋke bigew e.
Ɛ Bojuu ba bô bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu noo bikuu bi woŋ e tase, cu ntaŋ keenyɛwle bô boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e, etumyɛ bó bô ɛta ɛ́ bó ekpwekɛn.

Ɛ Jisos bvuu bɛn wvú yî bokaŋ e botɛte bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Semon waa Jon, wo kooŋke me?” Ɛ Bita yuw no Jisos bife ɛ̂ wvú yî bokaŋ e botɛte lɛ laa wvú kooŋke wen ɛ, ɛ fí ffumse lo wvú. Ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Tata, wo kee fiɛɛ ficii, wo kee lo lɛ me ŋkooŋke wo.” Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nyaŋyi njée yɛm.

Geenɛn kɛ fiɛɛ fì nu sɛ fí yuule lo nu ke eley ɛ̂ kelaante kin e kɛ. Kɛ wee wvù gee mwɛɛm mvù bɛmte kɛnɛɛ wvù mbiayte mbiay nu ke eley jó kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu ke eley kɛ bonyii bò bó nu ɛ saŋ ɛdiee ɛbo ɛ̂ ŋwa' Waa Njee wvù bó saŋ ɛdiee ɛ bonyii bò kɛŋke nshii le jó.

Kpwoon wvudvu to nu ɛ sufe ye bô ndvú bonyii bo baay baay ɛ yí yɛɛle lo, ɛ wvú lawkene ye le bô biɛɛ bì bó kene bô ketwaa ke bigew e kè yɛɛle noo dikfuu di ɛta yò lumte le noo ɛjisɛ ɛ baŋ. Wvú to jici fiko ɛ̂ wvú ɛbo ɛ bó ɛ kene bô ketwaa ke bigew e kè yɛɛle ɛ fí ɛ yiŋsɛn bô mwɛɛm mvù bɛmte noo nnyɛn ye kenjaŋ.
Ben dioo gee mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim, no tomyi keŋkoŋɛn fwe. Keŋkoŋɛn nu fiɛɛ fì taashi mwɛɛm mvunciim ɛ mvú sɛ nu yî fiɛɛ le fimwaaŋ.
Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Kefew nu ɛ kocɛn wase kè wee wvù diee nu Waawee nu ekɛŋkɛ diee dì kuuke.
Wo wvù kayte lɛ fo dwee wee kɛnɛɛ kpwɛɛ wee ejiim bô wee mvu, wo nu sɛ wo gee nonɛn e? Wo wvù kaci lo fiɛɛ fi ɛkumɛ mvumooso, wo nu sɛ wo cooŋke mwɛɛm yéw ncese yi mvumooso le?
Geenɛn kebefɛ ɛ mum ɛ bɛɛ ɛkuse jo nci wvun ɛ shiw ɛjisɛ yò dewkene yî yɛm e jé le jé le. Ɛ́ nci be baa nu, kebefɛ saa ekɛŋke mvuŋgay kɛ.
Me nu ŋke enfi wo can Bojuu noo bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu le, ɛ ɛ̀ nu bó bò me nu entum wo fô bó le.

Ɛ̀ kumyì lɛ beene tɛn to shee gee keyuŋ, tɛmyi bikuu, jayte je. Beene to nu bonfaw bo mwɛɛm e jɛɛy jɛɛy mvù ye yesebeene to kooŋke, bvuu diee bikuu bisɛɛbeene. Beene to cee nce wesebeene kɛŋke kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu mvuntelem mvù befe bô kendoŋ ke benɛɛn, ɛ bonyii bane beene ɛ beene bane tɛn bonyii.
Me njemyi fin ɛ̂ wo fwe dvu Nyo' bô Klistu Jisos noo bonceendaa bò Nyo' nu ɛ baa lɛ, wo egeè fiɛɛ fì me ŋgayte fin yaa tuu dwen wee mvu kɛ, egeè fiɛɛ yaa duŋci kejɛɛy jɛɛy kɛ.
Nonɛn, fo ben ecinɛ fiɛɛ fì ben leeme wase yî dvú le kɛ, njefo ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ ɛ fí kɛŋke nlawma wvù kuuke.
Fí ɛ mum ɛ no nu lɛ, wee wvù bó nu ɛ nya lemme can ye le kɛŋke keegee no cee ɛkolɛ we gomte.
Ɛ Bita no nu Jofa yî ɛdiuw e nteen, cee bô wee mvu wvù to seysee jéw ɛ diee nu Semon.
Kɛ ben kee lɛ ben nu yew Nyo' ɛ Keyoy kew ke wvú wvù Nyo' le cee yî yene le le?
Boom bo bwɛɛm e, fí ɛ mum ɛ no nu lɛ ɛlɛmɛ ke Jisos e nu ɛ yene wase je ɛ beene nulo eley keseen yaa fane kɛ, egɛn fô Bvudvuu bwɛ bvù looci Yuule naa ntay e.
Ɛ Jisos bvuu gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Me nu ŋke eŋgɛn, ɛ́ ben eshɛɛ egom me eghan ekpwe ɛ̂ bibefɛ binɛn e. Fô me ŋgɛne nu ɛ kɛ ben nulo eto fó kɛ.”

No Nyo' nu ɛ caw wase ben, ben ɛ no nu bonyii bew, ɛ wvú kooŋke ben, ben emum ejo keŋge ke lɛŋ kè lɛ: wee ecamtè shen fô waa bwee le, geè mwɛɛm mvù jee fô bonyii le, shiwsè bikuu binɛn, nù wɛɛ, kuulè shém,
Ɛ́ wee lemte me le, tu wvú kɛŋke keebii me le, ɛ naa fɛɛ fò me nu, ɛ́ wee wɛm lemme enù tɛn fó. Ɛ́ wee lemte me le, tu Icɛm nu ke ebuw wvú.”
Wvú kɛŋke keenu wee wvù kee keetaa fô yew ye le ntay, gee ɛ boom bew yuuke wvú le yî fiɛɛ le ficii, wvumte wvú.
Nonɛn ben emum eyvuwsè mvuntelem mvu wee noo wee le, eyootè tɛn wee noo wee ɛ wvú kuu kɛ no ben gee wase.
Saaka wvù ben to yuwɛɛ ɛ kɛw foŋkɛw nu kɛ wvun wvù lɛ, beene ekoŋenè.
Me ŋkpwaake lɛ nje ŋgɛw wvù nu keseen, nu ɛ fí jee lɛ wee emɛy kɛ enù no wvú nu.
Wee ŋgoo Bofalasii mvu to nu ɛ bó teŋe lɛ Nikodɛmus, ɛ wvú nu wee ŋgoo bikuu bi woŋ Bojuu le.

Ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no fi La'ab wvù to nu kpwoon nsake le to nu. Fiɛɛ fì to geɛ ɛ Nyo' yɛn lɛ wvú nu ɛ kocɛn wee we le to nu gee diew di lɛŋ. Wvú to nu ɛ fiisɛn boŋkee bo Islael ɛ̂ wvú yew, ke duŋcɛ je yimi jɛɛy yì bó etu jim jó.

Naa no fí cim nu nonɛn, nu ɛ Nyo' nu ke eboyse kpwoon fele yî boom bò wvú boote le, fɛn ɛ́ wvú ɛ mɛy ɛ no leeme yî fitele fì wvú lese yî Nyo' le, kɛŋke keŋkoŋɛn, cee nce wvù yuule noo wvù kɛŋke n'wvum e.
Nyo' bonyii bo Islael to nu ɛ caw bo'icee cee bosɛse, ge ɛ kfuu dibole no kuuke seke bó to nu botolo woŋ wvù Ijiw e. Ɛ wvú ke mum bvuse bó jó bô mvuŋgay mwew,
Ɛ Nyo' wvù kee mvuntelem mvu bonyii le, duŋcɛ lɛ wen nu ɛ fiisɛn bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu, nya bó bô Keyoy ke Yuule lɛŋlɛŋ no wvú to nyaɛ ɛ̂ beene.

Ɛ fí nu nonɛn, njefo Nyo' wvù to gayɛɛ lɛ, “Fo wo ejaŋ kpwɛɛ wee kɛ” nu kɛ tɛn wvú wvù to gayɛɛ lɛ, “Fo wo eyu wee kɛ.” Ɛ́ wo nu sɛ wo nu ɛ jaŋ kpwɛɛ wee, geenɛn ɛ yu wee, tu wo nu ɛ ŋgoy kɛ nci Nyo'.
ɛ me nyaa nshii wvù mɛy lo ɛ̂ yí. Kɛ yí nu ke eyuu ela kɛ. Ɛ wee yaa nu dvú wvù nu ke eyuu elo yí can yɛm e kɛ.
Ɛ̀ shɛɛte wase caan ɛ́ Nyo' wvù ɛ̀ nu Nyo' nyɛkeey etufe Satan ɛ́ ben eben yî dvú le bô bikaa. Me nlɛke lɛ Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos Klistu ebuw ben bô kembonɛn kew ɛ́ kí enù ben ɛ bó.
Bó nu ke eduŋci lɛ bó leeme yî fiɛɛ fi Nyo' le, geenɛn bvuu tune mvuŋgay mvu fiɛɛ fi Nyo' le fidvu. Ɛ̀ wɛmtè lo kfuu boba bonyii.
Ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no beene nu. Naa no beene cim nu nteen, nu ɛ beene nu ye miaaŋ yî Klistu le. Ɛ wee mvu yaa nu fô ɛkolɛ kew e maaŋ kɛ.

Njeme wvù me njeme wvun nu naa lo kecɛɛy. Me nshieele naa lɛ wo ejemyì ciise lo mwɛɛm mvun ɛ̂ bonyii, wvu lɛ bonyii bò nu ɛ bee Nyo' le eyɛn lɛ bó enya bikuu bibole keegee gee dì jee. Mvun nu naa mwɛɛm mvù jee baay, ɛ mvú too bô sɛw fô bonyii le bocii.
Ɛ fí mum kocɛn no bó to saŋɛɛ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le lɛ, “Abla'am to nu ɛ lese fitele yî Nyo' le, nje nonɛn, ɛ Nyo' yɛn lɛ wvú nu wee wvu teytey.” Ɛ bó mum no teŋe wvú lɛ nsaa Nyo'.
Boom bo bwɛɛm e, no ben nu ɛ lese wase fitele yî Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos Klistu wvù nu Tata bvukukɛ le, fo ben eduŋcì kejɛɛy jɛɛy kɛ.
Bó nu ɛ yan bosew ɛ gɛɛ boyɛ diɛwɛ jém e. Bó nu bonyii bo leme le. Njeme wvù buyte dew yibole nulo eyu wee diɛwɛ ɛdien ɛ fimbuw e.
Ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no bolemsɛ tɛn kɛŋke keekooŋkè bokɛ' bobole kɛ no bó kooŋke yibo ye. Ɛ́ wee kooŋke kpwɛse, tu wvú kooŋke ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛkolɛ kew.

No fí nu nonɛn, ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ beene emum egay lɛ la? Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ beene egay lɛ bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu bò to baa momte keenu teytey ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise nu wase keseen teytey ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise nje fitele fì bó lese yî ye le.
Bó kɛŋke keejicì kenyilɛ ke fiɛɛ fì Nyo' nu ɛ duŋcɛ wase ɛ̂ beene ɛkumɛ mbee le, leeme yî dvú le ɛ fiɛɛ yaa saake bó fô fitele le kɛ.

Fo bonfaw bò bonyii bò kɛŋke bó nu bonyii bo mbee le emum ejoò bó ɛkuse lɛ njefo bó bocii nu boom bo bwee wan e yî Klistu le kɛ. Bó kɛŋke keelemte lo fô bó le ntay fesene lo, njefo bonyii bò kɛŋke sɛw lemme dibole nu ɛ ɛ̀ nu bonyii bo mbee le ɛ bó kooŋke bó naa ntay. Ɛ̀ yɛɛyì bonyii bô mwɛɛm mvun, teete bó lɛ bó egeè mvú.
Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó emum egay lɛ no bonyii bomew bó le to baa eleeme yî diɛw yidvu le, tu fifiɛ nu ege ɛ́ Nyo' saa ebvuu eleeme yî diɛw ye le?
Ɛ wee mvu ŋgoo bonyii bo nci le bon dita di Jisos e bô goo. No wvú bon nonɛn, kaŋ mwaaŋ ɛ ɛlɛmɛ bô joo ta buy fó.
Nci wɛm nu wvun wvù nu lɛ ben ekoŋenè kɛ no me ŋkooŋke ben.

Fo ben ebvuu ecinɛ ɛ́ kebefɛ ejoo biba binɛn bi ye le diɛwɛ mwɛɛm mwew mvu lemme le gee mwɛɛm mvù befe dvú kɛ. Ben enya bikuu binɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ Nyo' diɛwɛ bonyii bò bó nu ɛ bvuse wase bó yî kpwe le ɛ nya bó bô nshii. Ben enya tɛn biba binɛn bi ye le ɛ̂ Nyo' diɛwɛ mwɛɛm mwew mvu lemme le keegee mwɛɛm mvu teytey dvú.
Geenɛn, kɛ beene nu boba bò tfuuke bikaa bò nu ke ela kɛ. Beene nu fisɛɛbeene bonyii bò nu ɛ lese fitele yî Nyo' le bò biyoy bibole nu ke eboy.

Fí nu ke edioo ɛ kooy nonɛn, ɛ́ bonyii bo Islael bocii emum eboy. Ɛ̀ nu fí fì bó to saŋɛɛ ɛ Nyo' gayte lɛ, “Wee wvù nu ke ebvuse bonyii ŋgɛw e nu ke ebuy Sayon. Wvú nu ke ebvuse gee dì befe ɛ̂ kfuu di Yakow e.
Bojuu ban nu bò to yuɛ Tata Jisos. Ɛ ɛ̀ nu bó bò to yuwyi bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le. Ɛ̀ nu bó bò to kuŋɛɛ bese jo bó. Bó gee nonɛn ɛ Nyo' yaa yuuke njoŋ bô bó kɛ. Bó bane lo bonyii bocii,

Beene ekeè lɛ ɛ́ beene nɛ ɛ bvuu ɛ no gee bibefɛ, gee kee, ɛ beene nu ɛ bó ɛ fiisɛn wase je yi kecɛɛy, ɛ́ beene no keè lɛ kɛ ncese wvumvu bvuu nu dvú wvù ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó ebvuu ege fô bibefɛ bisɛɛbeene le kɛ.
No wvú to taashɛɛ beene ɛ bo Klistu Jisos bvuse yî kpwe le nonɛn, mum bense beene shike beene ɛ bó woŋ wvu we le.
Fí ɛ mum ɛ no nu lɛ, ben ecinɛ mbiay e, ɛ́ wee ejemyì ɛ ɛ̀ nu kecɛɛy ɛ̂ waa bwee njefo beene bocii nu biba bi ye yimiaaŋ e.
Ɛ bese faŋɛ yaa bee naa lo fiɛɛ fì bó to too dvú caan kɛ. Ɛ bese to ge nonɛn wvu lɛ bese gomte keegɛɛ kecɛɛy kè ɛ̀ nu ke saaka wvù jee wvù wvu Nyo' le wvun fô ben e.
Fí ɛ mum ɛ no nu lɛ, ɛ́ wee jemyi díɛw yì bó baa kee yí kɛ, ɛ́ wvú no bunlee lɛ Keyoy ke Nyo' le enya wen bô bvufee keecɛɛyi fiɛɛ fì wvú jemyi ɛ̂ bonyii.
Ɛ̀ to nu kefew kekiɛ le, ɛ Saul bɛɛ kɛ ffuuke, bɛmsee bonyii bo ŋgoo le bo Tata le lɛ wen nu eyuwyɛ bó. Ɛ wvú mum gɛn fô ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le,
Keseen nu ɛ me ŋkaase wase ntoo fô wo le, ɛ mwɛɛm mvun nu ɛ me njemyi mbɛɛ yî woŋ wvun e wvu lɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó ekɛŋke njoŋ wvu wɛm ɛ wvú ɛ yiŋsɛn yî bó le.
Ben elaŋlaŋè lo lɛ ben yɛne ŋgɛw diɛwɛ no Klistu to yɛnɛɛ wvu lɛ ɛ́ ke edioo enu seke wvú ɛ buynɛn bô bvukukɛ bwew, ɛ́ ben ebvuu elaŋlaŋe, yuuke njoŋ.
Ɛ me ndioo ntaa jó, n'yɛn nyám e dikfuu le dikfuu le, ɛ yimi nu yi fô yew e, yimi yi ŋkpwaante bô yì sone, noo mvunyiim mvù bile we.

Geenɛn keseen, ben kɛŋke keecinɛ mvú le mvunciim. Ben ecinɛ shém yì ton'yɛɛn bô mvuntelem mvù sɛsene noo mvuntelem mvù befe le. Fo wee ebeetè bô diee di wee le kɛ. Fo njeme wvù samte ebuytè diuw wee le kɛ.
dioo yɛn lɛ bó seysee jéw yì bó saaŋke cún dvú, ɛ ɛ̀ to nu kɛ tɛn lemme dì wvú wvù Baul to cee nje dí, ɛ wvú mum no cee fó, ɛ bô bó lemte.
Nonɛn fo ben ebvuu ebee ɛ́ kebefɛ ekɛŋke mvuŋgay ɛ̂ we jo kencaa kenɛn ke ye le gee ɛ ben yuuke ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì ɛlɛmɛ kenɛn gomte lɛ ben egeè le kɛ.
Boba bonyii nu ɛ bese gayte bvuu ciise lo ɛ̂ bó ɛ̂ diee di Tata Jisos Klistu le lɛ bó eshii fokuse elemtè keekɛŋke fiɛɛ fì bó edieè.
Ɛ bo'icee cee bosɛɛbeene bodvu ke nɛ no bene kendoŋ bô Yosɛw wvù waa bwee bó mum gese wvú, ɛ wvú gɛn no nu nfwa woŋ wvù Ijiw e. Geenɛn, ɛ Nyo' no taale kɛ fô wvú le,
Ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule ge ɛ mvu bó le wvù diee to nu Agabus ke nɛ leem we, tefe lɛ jeŋ yì tɛmyi nu ke ekoo woŋ tfuu. Jeŋ yidvu to nu ɛ ghan koo kefew kè Klawdius to nu Nfon wvu Lum.
No Baul mɛse ɛ jeme nonɛn, ɛ bô bó mum tum ɛnvuw fokuse bocii, bunle.
Bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo Klistu Jisos e nu ɛ ta wase nyam ye yibo bô mwɛɛm mvù befe mvù nyam ye yì ŋɛyte shieele yî kentam ke Jisos e.
Boom bo bwɛɛm e, ɛ́ mmom too fô ben e jé le jé le, ɛ́ ben jo lɛ ɛ̀ nu bvujoŋkɛ.
Nonɛn, ɛ́ beene duu lɛ beene nu yî kentaashɛ le beene ɛ bó, geenɛn kaa lɛne ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ kejiwɛ le, tu beene mbiayte lo, yaa cee bii kecɛɛy e kɛ.
Ɛ wvú yɛn ɛ̂ fiɛɛ fidvu le, ɛ ɛbulɛ ɛ yene, ɛ fiɛɛ fimew shiile fowe nu diɛwɛ ɛkolɛ ke ndvu le, ɛ bó jici yî ɛbuw yo ɛna le.
Beene bomew nɛ Baatia, bomew ɛ nɛ Medes bô Ɛlam, bomew ɛ nɛ Misobotɛmia bô Judea noo Kafadosia, bomew ɛ nɛ Bontus bô Ɛsia.
Nonɛn ɛ́ ben emum ecee nce ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvù nu ɛ kpwɛntɛn wvu bonyii bo Tata le. Ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvú, wvù wvú looci kooŋke. Ɛ́ ben dioo cee nonɛn emum egee dilemme dì jee jé le jé le, ekeè Nyo' gɛne fwe fwe.

Timatio waa wɛm, me nyaa lemme di fiɛɛ fì me njeme fin e can yo le, ɛ fí bii ɛ ɛ̀ nu mwɛɛm mvù bonyii to jemyɛɛ wase ɛkumɛ wo diɛwɛ bonyii bò teete bontum bo Nyo' le, wvu lɛ mvú ke efi wo ɛ́ wo etum jem yì jee.

Ɛjim jodvu, ɛ me nɛ n'yuw ɛ fiɛɛ yosene lo woŋ wvu we le diɛwɛ ɛ̀ nu kebombom ke bonyii le ke baay, wamte lɛ, “Mbense enù fô Nyo' wese le. Ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù boysee bonyii, ɛ ɛ̀ kɛŋke wvú bvukukɛ bô mvuŋgay.
Ɛ̀ to nu fwele, ɛ ben nu bonyii bò nu ɛ kpwe wase ɛ̂ keyoy e nje bojay bonɛn bô bibefɛ,
Kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ben ewuu ɛ̂ fiko fi ntaashɛ le fì ɛ̀ nu fi Tata le, bvuu wuu ɛ̂ fiko fi Satan e kɛ. Kɛ ɛ̀ nulo tɛn ɛ́ ben ediee mwɛɛm mvudien mvu Tata le bvuu diee mvu Satan e kɛ.
Mwɛɛm kɛ diɛwɛ kenjaŋ bô nce nnyɛn tfuu noo ken'yɛɛ ɛjisɛ yaa nu mvù bó eyuuke ɛkumɛ mvú ɛ̂ ben ɛntelɛŋ kɛ, njefo kɛ mvumvun nu mwɛɛm mvù enù ɛ̂ bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo Nyo' le ɛnte kɛ.

Bonyii dioo kɛŋke mvuntelem mvù yuule, ɛ mwɛɛm mvunciim no yuule fô bó le. Geenɛn, bó dioo kɛŋke mvuntelem mvù yiile sɛ bó kɛŋke mbee, fiɛɛ saa enu dvú fì yuule fô bó le kɛ, njefo boŋkpwawcɛ bobole bô je yì mvuntelem mvubole nu jó, nu ɛ befe wase.

Ɛ bonyii bocii bò to yuuke no ghayte lɛ, “Wvun nu kɛ wee wvù se ghane gɛne lo bô bonyii bò bunlee teŋe diee din Jɛlusalɛm e? Ɛ kɛ wvú to jan nɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu keekooyɛ bò nu jan ekase egɛn dvú, enya can bocee ncese bo baay baay e le?”

Geenɛn Jisos nu ɛ bó ɛ nya lemme ɛ̂ wvú ɛ dí kuuke fele di bocee ncese bo fwele le, kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no moŋkan mò wvú leeme fwe wvudvu ɛntelɛŋ jo Nyo' bô wee wvu wum kuuke tɛn fele mo moyvuum. Mó fele lo njefo moman bii ɛ ɛ̀ nu boŋkawma bò fele bo fwe le.
Me njemyi nonɛn nje, fô me le, ɛ́ me nu dvú, tu me nu kɛ bee Klistu, me ɛ́ ŋkpwe, ɛ́ enu sɛw fô me le.
Me ŋkee naa ntay lɛ Nyo' wvù kɛwɛɛ lemme dì jee din yî yene le nu ke egɛn dvú fwe egɛn emɛse diuu dì Jisos Klistu nu ke ekase eto le.

Beene kee lɛ Waa Nyo' nu ɛ to wase ɛ yene bvufee bvusɛɛbeene keekiɛɛ wvú wvù Nyo' wvu kecɛɛy. Ɛ beene nu yî ye le wvù ɛ̀ nu kecɛɛy njefo beene nu yî Waa we wvù Jisos Klistu le. Ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù Nyo' wvu kecɛɛy ɛ nshii wvù mɛy lo nu can ye le.
Ɛ́ je nu dvú, no ben yɛne, ɛ́ ben no momtè keecee yî nyɛkeey e ben ɛ bonyii bocii.
Beene eleemè tɛmyi ntay yî fiɛɛ fì beene taale fwe yî dvú le fì beene ké no jemyi ɛ̂ bonyii ɛkumɛ fí le. Fo beene etuwtenè kɛ, njefo wee wvù kawɛɛ beene leeme yî diɛw ye le.

Me nu ɛ ŋgɛɛ nyɛkeey lɛ wvú enu ben ɛ bó. Me nyaa nyɛkeey wvù ɛ̀ nu wvuwɛm ɛ̂ ben. Kɛ me nyaa nyɛkeey wvun ɛ̂ ben no bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo yî woŋ wvun e ké no nyaa kɛ. Fo ben ecinɛ ɛ́ mvuntelem mvunɛn ebuuke kɛnɛɛ kɛŋke jaŋ kɛ.
Nonɛn, bese ɛ mum ɛ no nu sekecii kee fifin sɛ kemaŋɛn. Bese kee lɛ no bese cee yî ye yin e yî woŋ wvun e, nu ɛ bese nu ncejole fô Tata le.
Ɛ́ wee yuw diɛw yɛm, ɛ faŋɛ yaa egɛɛ, me nsaa enlese wvú ŋgɛw e kɛ, njefo kɛ me nto nto keenlese bonyii bo yî woŋ wvun e ŋgɛw e kɛ. Me nto nto keemboyse lo bó.
Fo beene enù diɛwɛ Kɛɛn e kɛ. Wvú to nu waa Satan wvù wee kebefɛ wɛ, ke mum nɛ yu waa bwee. Ɛ wvú to yu wvú nje la? Wvú to yu njefo diew gee to nu dì befe, ɛ di waa bwee le nu di teytey.
Ɛ bitum bi ɛ̂ joo ɛntelɛŋ bicii fɛɛ lo, ɛ dikum tɛn lakɛn lo.

Ɛ fí mum no nu lɛ wee mwaaŋ wvù Abla'am wvù to nu ɛ wvú ɛ lun wase baay, nu wase diuw kpwe le, to nu ɛ nɛ ɛ ɛngokɛ ke wee le buy yî ye le duule diɛwɛ jón yi we le noo diɛwɛ monshɛɛm mo ŋgem joo yi baay e mò wee yaa nulo etaŋ etoo kɛ.

Nyo' nu Nfon wvu bvuyvuum e sɛ ŋka, ɛ kɛ wvù yaa nulo ekpwe kɛ, ɛ kɛ bó nulo eyɛn wvú le kɛ. Ɛ̀ mɛy kɛ wvú maaŋ wvù ɛ̀ nu Nyo'. Beene etumtè moŋkum mew, nyaà n'wvum ɛ̂ wvú sekecii sɛ ŋka. Fí enù nonɛn.

Ɛ nceendaa wvudvu fuŋ foweɛwe lɛ, “Ben efanè Nyo' tumtè moŋkum mew, njefo kefew ke nsaw we le nu ɛ kocɛn wase. Ben enyaà mbense wvu baay ɛ̂ wvú wvù to bomɛɛ ɛbulɛ bô nshɛ noo joo yi baay bô mondvuum mò jóo buyte mó le.”

Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu kefew kemew e, no ŋgoo bonyii bo mbee le to kuu gɛne fwe, ɛ Bojuu bò to jemyi kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu díɛw Glek nɛ kɛw no wvukene Bojuu bò to jemyi díɛw woŋ lɛ bó gawte mwɛɛm ɛ̂ bokɛ' bo boŋkfu le ɛdiuw ɛcii nyaa mvu bo bowen e caan.
Ɛ̀ nu bvudvuu bvunɛn keeyɛne ŋgɛw nonɛn, njefo Klistu tɛn to nu ɛ yɛn ŋgɛw nje yene, duŋcɛ kenfewsɛn ɛ̂ ben lɛ ben ejo ɛkalɛ kew.
Ben ekeè lɛ naa seke bese to nu beene nu ɛ bese to nya nci wvun ɛ̂ ben lɛ, “Ɛ́ wee nu lɛ kɛ wen nu elemtè, fo bó enya wvú bô fiɛɛ fidien kɛ.”
Nyo' to nu ɛ loocɛ koŋ woŋ wvun baay, tum Waa we wvù mwaaŋ, wvu lɛ ɛ̀ nu naa yɛɛ wvù nu ɛ lese fitele yî ye le, mwɛtɛn saa ela kɛ, ɛ́ wvú ekɛŋke ɛ ɛ̀ nu nshii wvù mɛy lo.
Ɛ keyoy kè befe ke bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Me ŋkee Jisos, ŋkee tɛn Baul, ben nu finɛn baa?”
Ɛ me mum n'yɛn nyam yì bɛmte bô bonfon bo yî nshɛ le noo bonyii bobole bo jem e ɛ bó taashɛ keetum jem bô wee wvù shilɛɛ yî nyambala le noo bew bonyii bo jem e.

Ɛ bee bó ley ɛ̂ ŋguw wvù nɛn'yɛɛ Adamitium e wvù to nu keegɛne leemene mondvuum mo ŋgem joo le, keba kè Ɛsia le. Ɛ Alistakus wvù wee wvu Tɛsalonika, woŋ wvù Masedonia le to nu tɛn bee bó. Ɛ bee bó mum no gɛne.
Ben ekumyì bonyii bò nu yew ncaw e, enù kɛ diɛwɛ ben ɛ bó bocii nu yew ncaw e. Ben ekumyì tɛn bonyii bò bó nyɛwle bô bó, njefo ben tɛn kɛŋke ye.
Ben dioo gee fiɛɛ ficii fì ben gee, kɛnɛɛ ben jemyi lo, ɛ ben no gee diɛwɛ bonyii bo Tata Jisos e, nyaà keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo' Ice fele yî ye le.
Ɛ́ wee yɛɛyi wee bô diɛw Nyo', ɛ́ wee wvù bó yɛɛyi wvú gaw mwɛɛm mwew mvù Nyo' nya wvú dvú nya wee wvù yɛɛyi wvú wvudvu dvú.
Ɛ wvú no nu jan ɛ Nyo' faŋɛ yaa ecim enya wvú kɛ naa bô kpweŋ kɛ, geenɛn, kaw lɛ wen nu ke enya woŋ wvun ɛ́ enu we bô ɛŋgokɛ kew. Ɛ Nyo' to kaake nonɛn ɛ Abla'am baa cim kɛŋke wase wan kɛ.
Ɛ Nfon wvudvu mum no wɛɛntene, sɛne bonyii bosɛɛbeene, kane lɛ bo'icee cee bosɛɛbeene elaaŋke mvunlɛy mvu boom e ɛkfuŋ ɛ bó kpwekene.
Ɛ Bita bô waa ŋgoo Jisos wɛ mum buy no gɛne fô jem.
Nonɛn, me ɛ mum ɛ no momte ntay sekecii keencee nce wvu lɛŋ fwe dvu Nyo' noo bonyii, wvu lɛ fo fiɛɛ enu dvú fì esaakè me fô fitele le kɛ.

Bó nu diɛwɛ joo yi baay yì nffum fɛɛte bensee we le, ɛ gee dibole di kenshoose le nu diɛwɛ diffuw dì nffum fɛɛte bensee we yî joo le. Bó nu diɛwɛ jón yì waysene lo ncɛwncɛw e. Nyo' nu ɛ seyse wase bvudvuu bvu ŋgɛw e ɛ bvú jiime nɛn taytaytay sekecii, ɛ gɛɛ ɛ̂ bó.
Kɛ me nto n'yuw diuw wee mvu le, ɛ kɛ ɛ̀ to yɛɛyi wee me dvú kɛ. Ɛ̀ to duŋci Jisos Klistu ɛ̂ me.
Seke beene to bɛɛ cee bii no nyam ye yesebeene gomte, bonci to ké no kamsee ye yesebeene yì fuu gee ɛ biba bisɛɛbeene bi ye le lemte mwɛɛm mvù too ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô kpwe fô beene le.

Ɛ̀ nɛɛ fiɛɛ fì Nyo' to balɛɛ me lɛ me enù wee nfewcɛ noo waa ntum Jisos bô lɛ me enù wee n'yɛɛyi bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu keen'yɛɛyi bó ɛ́ bó elese fitele yî Klistu le, eyɛɛyi tɛn bó bô kecɛɛy. Kɛ fiɛɛ fì me njemyi fin nu ɛ me mbiayte lo kɛ. Me njemyi ɛ ɛ̀ nu kecɛɛy.
Bonyii bocii bò gɛɛle bonci bew nu yî ye le sekecii ɛ wvú nu tɛn yî bó le. Fiɛɛ fì gee ɛ beene sɛ kee lɛ beene nu yî ye le sekecii nu Keyoy ke Yuule kè wvú nu ɛ nya ɛ̂ beene.
Fo wee egeè fiɛɛ kpwaake kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛkolɛ kew kɛ. Wee ekpwaakè tɛn ɛkumɛ waa bwee.
Ben eceè yî fiɛɛ le fimwaaŋ. Fo ben ebenseè ye kɛ. Ben ekoolè nsán ben ɛ bonyii bo ncɛw ncɛw. Fo ben ejoò lɛ ben kee mwɛɛm fele no ben kee kɛ.
Ben elaŋ naa lo mvuntelem mvù cɛwkene bô shém yì ffuuke noo shém yì ton'yɛɛn noo waa noo keebeete bô ɛdiee ɛ bonyii noo mvuntelem mvù befe.
Nyo' nu ɛ gɛɛ me lɛ me enlemtè fô kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le, enfewcì diɛw ye ɛ̂ ben no yí nu yicii.
Yvuw ye ɛkolɛ to baa diɛwɛ ndaw wvù baa nɛn bvuuu le, ɛ ɛjisɛ ɛye bɛɛnci diɛwɛ leme di ŋguy e.
Mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim kooyi nje yene, wvu lɛ no mbuwma Nyo' saaŋkene gɛne fô bonyii le nteen nteen, ɛ́ keyoone kè bonyii nyaa ɛ̂ Nyo' ebiisè, ɛ mbense gɛne fô Nyo' le.
Wee wvù diee ye yɛm bvuu wuu ɛlɛmɛ kem cee yî yɛm e ɛ me tɛn ncee yî ye le.
Ɛ wvú bee lɛ, “'Ɛɛ Tata, me nu ɛ mbee lɛ wo nu Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ. Wo nu Waa Nyo' wvù to nu keeke eto yî woŋ wvun e.”
Ɛ bó mum nya bikuu bibole no yuuke mwɛɛm ɛ ɛ̀ nu mvù boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e to yɛɛyi. Ɛ bô bó no nu yî kentaashɛ le, guutene blɛɛd, bvuu bunlee yî kentaashɛ le.
Wo kooŋke ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fi teytey, bane fì befe. Nonɛn me wvù Nyo' wvù nu Nyo' wo ɛ mum ɛ mbense wo ɛ nfey ŋgoo yo, no me nu ɛ n'yefe wo bô nsusu bonfon yì ɛ̀ nu yi bvujoŋkɛ.”
Ɛ wvú gay ɛ bó gbwo Jɛm wvù waa bwee Jon ɛ wvú kpwe.
Ɛ̀ wɛmtè lo bonjeme bò yaa kɛŋke kɛ fiɛɛ keege bô Nyo', njefo bonjeme bodvu nu ege ɛ́ bonyii ecee kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu nce wvù yaa nu kɛ wvù Nyo' gomte gɛne dvú fwe.
Ɛ́ ɛ̀ nu naa yɛɛ wvù bane waa bwee, tu mwɛtɛn nu wee wvù yuwyi bonyii. Ɛ ben kee lo lɛ kɛ wee wvù yuwyi bonyii kɛŋke nshii wvù mɛy lo yî ye le kɛ.

Ɛ bó ke diekɛn mɛse, ɛ Jisos bɛn Bita bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Semon waa Jon, wo kooŋke me fele bomew ban e?” Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, “'Ɛɛ Tata, wo kee lo lɛ me ŋkooŋke wo.” Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nyaŋyì boom bem bo njée le.”
Ɛ wee mvu no kɛŋke ye nnya yì Keyoy ke Yuule nya ɛ̂ wvú ɛ ɛ̀ nu keejemyi diɛwɛ wee wvù kɛŋke bvufee le, nya yi wee mvu nnya ɛ ɛ̀ nu keejemyi diɛwɛ wee wvù kee fiɛɛ le. Ɛ Keyoy kin nu kɛ kemwaaŋ.
Ɛ bó ke dioo kase gɛn jó yî bokaŋ bo bofɛɛ le, ɛ Yosɛw mum ge ɛ boom bo bwee le kiɛɛ wvú. Ɛ wvú mum duŋcɛ tɛn bó ɛ̂ Fɛlo.
Ɛ̀ nu no bó nu ɛ saŋ lɛ, “Ɛ́ wee kooŋke keeyuw njoŋ yî nshii we le, bô keeyɛn ɛdiuw yò jee le, ɛ́ wvú no kemsene bô leme diew, ɛ díɛw fiɛɛ yaa buyte diuw we le kɛ.
Ɛ ŋgoo bonyii bo mbee le no nu fitele fimwaaŋ, nu yî wee le mwaaŋ, ɛ wee yaa teŋe fiɛɛ fimew lɛ ɛ̀ nu fiwene wen ɛmbeŋ kɛ. Ɛ fiɛɛ fi wee le nu fi bonyii bocii le.

Ben ekeè lɛ me nto nu ɛ nya fiɛɛ ɛ̂ ben ɛ fí kuuke baay fele lo mwɛɛm mvunciim. Ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ fí fì bó to nyaɛ ɛ̂ me. Fiɛɛ fidvu nu lɛ Klistu to nu ɛ kpwe fô bibefɛ bisɛɛbeene le kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no bó to saŋɛɛ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le,
Ɛ̀ nu kelaante kin kè ɛlɛmɛ ke bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le bô ke bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo Nyo' le nu can kí le. Ɛ ɛ̀ nu kí kè bonyii bocii bò bó yuwyi yî nshɛ le nu can kí le.”
Ɛ bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu yuw nonɛn, mum no yuuke njoŋ, bɛnsee diɛw yì yi Tata. Ɛ bonyii nteen bee saaka wvudvu le, ɛ ɛ̀ nu bò Nyo' to nu ɛ baa wase lɛ bó nu ke ekɛŋkɛ nshii wvù mɛy lo.
Wee wvù jemyi ɛkumɛ mwɛɛm mvun gayte lɛ, “Yî kecɛɛy e, me ntoo nfew caan.” Fí enù nonɛn. Tata Jisos, to!

Ben egeè mwɛɛm biì kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu n'yɛɛyi wvù me nto nyaɛ ɛ̂ ben e, kɛnɛɛ ɛ̀ nu mwɛɛm mvù ben to yuuke lo ɛ̂ me, kɛnɛɛ ɛ̀ nu mvù ben to yɛne lo. Ben nu dioo gee no nɛn, ɛ́ Nyo' wvù gee ɛ mvuntelem mvu bonyii le nu nyɛkeey emum enu ben ɛ bó.
Geenɛn, fo ben ejoò wvú diɛwɛ wee bvuban e kɛ. Ben etefe lo wvú diɛwɛ waa bwee wene le.

Ben eyɛnè fo wee ke ejo bvufee bvu ɛcici bvu fokuse fɛn bvu kenlɛɛma le enjim ben dvú ɛ́ ben etu bonfaw kɛ. Bvufee bvun nu bvù bii boŋkpwawcɛ bo wee wvu wum bô bo mwɛɛm mvù saake yî woŋ wvun e. Kɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu bvù bii boŋkpwawcɛ bo Klistu le kɛ.
Me mbone ŋaŋ ntaale kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu fó fô me ŋgɛne, keeŋkɛŋkɛ mmawcɛ wvù ɛ̀ nu ntee wvù Nyo' nu ɛ tee me lɛ me emben ento we no me nu ɛ ntaashɛ bee Klistu Jisos.
Wvú to nu ɛ nya ɛkolɛ kew nje yese beene keesum beene yî bibefɛ le bicii, keege ɛ́ beene eyuule, nu bonyii bew bò kɛŋke shiee wvu baay keegee gee dì jee.

Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy kecɛɛy lɛ wee wvù nu ɛ yuw diɛw yɛm e, ɛ bee wee wvù tum me le, nu ɛ wvú kɛŋke nshii wvù mɛy lo. Kɛ mwɛtɛn bɛɛ ke ebvuu ekɛŋke nsaw kɛ. Wvuwɛ wee nu ɛ buy wase can kpwe le, ɛ ley nshii le.
Nceendaa Nyo' wvù to jemyi ɛ̂ me to kɛŋke nfew ɛbo ɛ ɛ̀ nu kembaŋ ɛ bó kene bô ketwaa ke bigew e kè yɛɛle. Nfew wvudvu to nu keefew kelaante kedvu bô dew ketaaŋ noo bimbew bi ketaaŋ e dvú.
Boba bonyii nu ɛ bó nu ke elɛse lo bó. Wvubo nyo' nu diuwdiee. Bó bensee ye yî mwɛɛm mvù bó bee keewuumene lo yî dvú le. Ŋkpwawcɛ wvubo nu kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî mwɛɛm mvu fokuse fɛn e.
Kɛ wvú kɛŋke keenu wee wvù bɛɛ baŋke lo ɛ̀ no nu wee mbee kɛ. Ɛ́ wvú nu wvuwɛ wee, ɛ́ wvú ke enɛ sekemew emum ebensee ye, ke enɛ eley ŋgɛw diɛwɛ wvu dɛwle le.

Nsáa yɛm shém, me nse ŋkpwawci naa baay lɛ me nu ensaŋ fô ben e ɛkumɛ mboyma wvù beene bocii nu ɛ kɛŋkɛ wase, ɛ nɛ ɛ n'yɛn lɛ fí nu shiee le baay keensaŋ enlɛkɛ ben lɛ ben ediuù keetomte mbee wvù bó to nyaɛ ɛ̂ beene bò ɛ̀ nu bonyii bo Nyo' le. Ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ ɛ bó to nya wa lo ɛ̂ beene kaŋ mwaaŋ ɛ fimew yaa bɛɛ kɛ.
Bó to ton'yi shém njefo Bita bô Jon to yɛɛyi bonyii, fewci lɛ no Jisos to buyɛɛ yî kpwe le nu ɛ boŋkfu nu ke ebuy tɛn yî kpwe le.
Bibefɛ biew nu ɛ bí ɛ loocɛ wase ɛ yiŋsɛn ɛ ben ɛ buy fowe, Nyo' ɛ kume wvú yî mwɛɛm mwew mvù befe le.
Ɛ Jisos ke bvuu kase gɛn Kana wvu ɛ̂ keba kè Galilee le jò wvú to baŋkɛɛ joo ɛ ɛ̀ tu mbvuum. Ɛ̀ to nu ɛ wee wvu baay mvu nu ɛ̂ kelaante kè Kafana'um e, ɛ waa we wvù diemsɛn cɛmte.
Fo ben egeè ŋgoy kɛ. Mvuntelem mvunɛn eyvuwsè sekecii ɛ ben lemte lemme di Nyo' le.
Keseen nu ɛ ben kooŋke Jisos Klistu ɛ ben ke baa cim yɛn wase wvú le kɛ, ɛ ben ɛ lese fitele yî ye le, yaa yɛne wvú le kɛ. Ben ɛ mum ɛ no yuuke njoŋ naa wvu baay wvù ɛ̀ nulo wee saa esee kɛ,
Beene kee lɛ beene nu yî ye le sekecii ɛ wvú nu yî yese beene le, njefo wvú nu ɛ nya beene bô Keyoy kè ɛ̀ nu kew.
Nsɛfe mvu to leeme fó bô mbvuum mo ŋgbwayŋgbwayi jó ɛ mó ɛ yiŋsɛn. Ɛ bonyii bo nci le bodvu mum ffum kusha jó bon yî fite fi isob e nɛke diuw we le.
Wvú nu ɛ bvuse wase beene can mvuŋgay mvu ɛjiwɛ le, ɛ gɛɛ ɛnte jo bvunfon bvu Waa we wvù nu fitele fiew e.
Boom bo bwɛɛm e, me nlɛke lo ben lɛ ben eyɛnè ɛkumɛ bonyii bò too bô keŋgawsɛn jewsee ben bô n'yɛɛyi wvù kicine wvù bó to yɛɛyɛɛ ben dvú le. Ben elewtè lo boba bonyii.
Ɛ́ nnya wee nu keelemte fô bonyii le, ɛ́ wvú no lemtè fô bó le. Ɛ́ yi wee nu keeyɛɛyi bonyii, ɛ́ wvú no yɛɛyì.
Ɛ̀ nu ke enu kefew kekiɛ le, ben saa ebvuu ebife fiɛɛ ɛ̂ me kɛ. Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy kecɛɛy lɛ, ɛ́ ben bife naa la ɛ̂ Icɛm, ɛ́ wvú enya fiɛɛ fidvu ɛ̂ ben ɛ̂ diee diem e.

Bó to nu ɛ fee kenffuy ke kelaante kedvu le bô dikfuu di ɛta yò lumte le jɛɛy jɛɛy ɛ yó kɛŋke ncóm jɛɛy jɛɛy. Di fwe to nu ɛ bó teŋe lɛ Jasba, ɛ dì bii fó nu Safiya, ɛ di ditɛte nu Agɛt, ɛ di dinɛw nu Ɛmelaal,
Nonɛn, ɛ́ wee kee fiɛɛ fi lɛŋ fì wvú kɛŋke keege, ɛ faŋɛ yaa ege, tu wvú nu ɛ ge kebefɛ.

Ɛ diɛw mi mum buy fô kawla le gayte lɛ, “Ben bocii bò nu bonyii bo lemme le bo Nyo' le, ben ebenseè Nyo' wesebeene, ɛ́ ben bocii bò fane wvú kɛnɛɛ ɛ̀ nu bo caan caan kɛnɛɛ bo baay baay, enyaà mbense ɛ̂ wvú.”
No beene nu fɛn keseen nu ɛ beene looci naa shomkene, njefo beene beele baay lɛ bó etfume yew yi fowe yɛ yî yese beene le diɛwɛ ndvu le.
Wee tfuu etaa mwɛɛm mvù wvú gee, eyɛn laa wen gee lɛŋ ɛ. Ɛ́ wvú fɛn gee lɛŋ, ɛ́ wvú sɛ no saale ye fô ɛkolɛ kew e. Geenɛn fo wvú esaalè ye fewsene ɛkolɛ kew bô wee mvu kɛ.

Ɛ́ diemsɛn leyte wan kpwoon, ɛ nɛ ɛ no yɛne lɛ gee diwene fô wan kpwoon wvudvu le baa nu lɛŋ kɛ, ɛ ye ŋɛyte wase wvú baay, ɛ fí nu kɛ lɛ bó etaashɛ enu, ɛ́ wvú ge no wvú shieele, taashɛ bô kpwoon wvudvu. Tu wvú baa ge kebefɛ kɛ.
Bó nu ke ekuŋ ben yéw bunle le. Yî kecɛɛy e, kefew too lo kè wee nu ke edioo yuu wee mvu ben e, eyuu kpwaake lɛ wen gee ɛ ɛ̀ nu lemme dì jee fô Nyo' le.

Ɛ me mbvuu nɛ n'yɛn kfuu fiɛɛ fi diuw wvù yumɛɛn e fimew fowe, ɛ ɛ̀ nu naa lo keŋghaw ke fiɛɛ le ke baay. Ɛ̀ to nu bonceendaa bo Nyo' le bosooshwiy ɛ bó kɛŋke boŋgɛw bosooshwiy bò ɛ̀ nu bo kemɛse le keenya ɛ̂ bonyii, njefo boban nu bò Nyo' nu emɛse eduŋcɛ shém ye yì ffuuke dvú.
Ɛ Jisos bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ́ me fɛn nu ɛ njeme ɛ njay, ɛ́ wo duŋcɛ jay wvudvu. Ɛ́ me fɛn njemyi ɛ ɛ̀ nu kecɛɛy, wo ɛ kaa ɛ suŋ lo me nje la?”

Me ɛ no ŋgayte tɛn ɛ̂ wo wɛ wvù looci nu naa wee wɛm ŋgoo lɛ wo efi kɛ bokɛnɛ ban ɛ́ bó etu diuw mwaaŋ. Ɛ̀ nu bonyii ɛ bó ɛ katɛn wase bee bó yî lemme di saaka wvù jee wvu ɛkumɛ Jisos Klistu le bô bo Kelɛmɛn noo bonyii bomew bò bee bó to lemte. Bonyii ban bocii nu ɛ ɛdiee ɛbo nu wase ɛ̂ ŋwa' bonyii bò kɛŋke nshii wvù mɛy lo le.
Bonyii ban nu bò ɛlɛmɛ ke bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu buw e noo bonyii buw bo ntum e nu fobo fo bó. Wo ɛ mum ɛ nya ɛlɛmɛ ɛ̂ bó, bó ɛ wu. Fifin nu naa nlawma wvubo.”
Kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ fí enù nonɛn kɛ! Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ beene bò nu ɛ kpwe wase fô kebefɛ le ebvuu eghan nɛɛ le sɛ ebvuu ecee yî kebefɛ le?

Fí ɛkumɛ nyam yì bɛmte yɛ yì to nu dvú ɛ yí yaa bɛɛ dvú kɛ, nu ɛ yí nu tɛn nfon, ɛ nfon wvun nu wvu bokaŋ nyaŋ, geenɛn ɛ wvú nu ŋgoo bonfon bo bosooshwiy ba le. Wvuwɛ tɛn nu ke edioo ɛ to emum egɛn fò bó nu elɛse lo wvú.
Bó saŋ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le ɛkumɛ fiɛɛ fin lɛ la? Bó nu ɛ saŋ lɛ, “Kuŋɛ kpwoon wvù nu nfwa bô waa we bocii, njefo kɛ waa nfwa nulo ke egaw bvushɛw bô waa kpwoon wvù leyɛɛn e kɛ.”
Geenɛn bonyii bò gomte ɛ ɛ̀ nu bvukukɛ ké ley mmom e, jo ɛ̂ ketam e, mum ley shiee mwɛɛm e nteen mvu keyuŋ e mvù too bô boŋgɛw. Ɛ mwɛɛm mvun nu mvù ffûmte bonyii ŋgɛw e ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu wvu wɛɛ kɛ.

Ɛ bitoŋ bi yuufe bì wo be yɛn biɛ nu ɛ bô bo nyam yì bɛmte yɛ nu ke ebane kpwoon nsake wɛ. Bó nu ke eyow mwɛɛm mwew mvunciim ɛ́ wvú emɛy kenyi kencimte, ɛ́ bó eŋoŋ nyam ye ye, emɛse eton wvú bô ŋguy.
Geenɛn, ɛ́ wee kooŋke Nyo', ɛ́ Nyo' no kee mwɛtɛn.
Beene nu jeme naa lɛ la keseen? Bese Bojuu fele bonyii bomew e? Naa fɛɛ ghɛɛy! Beene nu ɛ yɛn wase lɛ Bojuu noo bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu nu can mvuŋgay mvu kebefɛ le.
Ɛ bó mum kene fimooso ɛ fí fieesene waa na', sɛɛyɛ nyám ge ncese dvú ɛ̂ fí, mum no laŋlaŋe yî fiɛɛ le ɛ ɛ̀ kene bó bô can yibo.

Naa no fí to kooyɛɛ nonɛn, kebɛse ke bonyii le kè mwɛɛm mvu boŋgɛw e mvun to baa yuwyɛ bó, to baa cim ekumɛn mvuntelem mvubole yî mwɛɛm mvù bó to gee bô can yibole kɛ. Bó to baa kumɛn keebunlee bonceendaa bo dɛwle le bô mvumooso kɛnɛɛ ɛ̀ nu mvù bó kene bô ketwaa ke bigew e kè yɛɛle kɛnɛɛ kè baa kɛnɛɛ bô ketfu kè nɛɛ, kɛnɛɛ ɛta, kɛnɛɛ kete. Ɛ mvumooso mvun nu sɛ mvú nulo eyɛn fiɛɛ le kɛnɛɛ eyuw kɛnɛɛ elɛn.

No bese kee fiɛɛ fì nu keefane Tata, bese ɛ mum ɛ no momte keege ɛ́ bonyii ekumɛn. Nyo' looci naa kee bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bese naa ntay. Ɛ me ŋkpwaake lɛ ben tɛn kee ntay ɛ̂ mvuntelem mvunɛn e bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bese.

Ɛ̀ nu kɛ tɛn no beene bocii to shee cee. Beene to cee gee mwɛɛm mvù nyam ye yì ŋɛyte shieele, bii mwɛɛm mvù nyam ye bô boŋkpwawcɛ bosɛɛbeene gomte lɛ beene egeè. Beene diɛwɛ bonyii bo boyuum to nu wase lo bonyii bò shém effuuke Nyo' bô bó, kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ diɛwɛ no wee wvu wum tfuu nu.
Ɛ Bita bvuu jeme mwɛɛm nteen, tefe bó, lɛkɛ lɛ bó efi bikuu bibole yî ŋgɛw wvù nu keeke eto yî ɛŋgokɛ kè befe kin e.
Ɛ́ ben cee bii no nyam ye gomte, tu ben nu ke ekpwekɛn. Geenɛn ɛ́ ben cine Keyoy ke Yuule ɛ lɛse gee dì befe dì nyam ye gomte, tu ben nu ke ekɛŋkɛ nshii.
Ŋwa' Nyo' jemyi lɛ, “Kɛ wee wvù nu ɛ bee wvú le nu ke ekɛŋkɛ ken'wuumɛn kɛ.”
Me ŋgomte keen'yaw enya keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo' wɛm nje ben bocii nfele yî Jisos Klistu le, njefo woŋ tfuu jemyi ɛkumɛ fitele fì ben nu ɛ lese yî ye le.
Boom bo bwee wese le bò Nyo' kooŋke, bese kee lo lɛ Nyo' nu ɛ caw wase ben.
Fiɛɛ fì fele mwɛɛm mvunciim nu kɛ lɛ wee ekooŋkè waa bwee bô fitele fiew ficii njefo keŋkoŋɛn ké no baŋyi bibefɛ nteen.
Ɛ bó ke dioo seyse lɛ bee bo Baul eley ŋguw wvu ɛ̂ joo egɛn woŋ wvù Itali le, ɛ bó mum nya Baul bô bonyii bo ncaw e bomew can Julius wvù to nu ɛkolɛ ke ŋgoo mi bonyii bo nci le bo Nfon wvu Lum e.

yemte ŋkiee Muses wvù wee lemme Nyo' bô ŋkiee Waa Njee. Bó to yemte lɛ, “O Tata Nyo' wvù Kɛŋke Mvuŋgay Mvunciim, mwɛɛm mvù wo gee nu naa mvu baay bô mvu keŋghaw e. Wo nu Nfon bitum bicii, ɛ je yì wo gee mwɛɛm jó nu yi teytey bô yi kecɛɛy.
Ben ekɛŋkè shiee fô ɛmben yo ɛ̂ keyoy e yò ɛ̀ nu diɛw Nyo' ɛyinɛyin e, kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no wan wvu caan ké no kɛŋke fô ɛmben e, wvu lɛ yí egeè ɛ ben kuu gɛne fwe yî mboyma wene le,

Ɛ me nɛ n'yuw ɛ diɛw jemyi woŋ Nyo' le, gayte ɛ̂ me lɛ, “Saŋɛ fin: Ɛ kɛw yî keseen ɛ gɛn lo nu ɛ njoŋ wvu baay nu fô bonyii bò kpwee ɛ bó ɛ taashɛ bô bo Tata le.” Ɛ Keyoy ke Nyo' le bɛnse lɛ, “Njoŋ wvu baay nu fô bó le kecɛɛy, njefo bó nu elɛɛtɛn yî monlum mobole, ɛ́ gee dibole dì jee ebi bó le.”

Mbee wvù Nyo' Icee wesebeene yɛne ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvu lɛŋ bvuu yuule ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise, nu wvu wee wvù taale fô boom bo boŋkfu le noo fô bokɛ' bo boŋkfu le seke bó nu yî ŋgɛw e. Ɛ ɛ̀ bvuu nu tɛn wvù kemsene bô ɛkolɛ kew fo mwɛɛm mvu yî nshɛ le fɛn elom wvú.
Me njemyi fin wvu lɛ fo wee mvu ke enɛ eto bô njeme wvù yeke wvu fomvu fomvu elɛɛ ben dvú.

Ɛ me nɛ n'yuw ɛ mwɛɛm mvunciim mvù Nyo' to bomɛɛ mvù nu fowe noo yî nshɛ le noo ɛkuse jo nshɛ noo ɛ̂ joo yi baay e, naa mwɛɛm mvunciim mvù nu mondvuum man e, ɛ mvú yemte lɛ, “Mbense bô n'wvum noo bvukukɛ noo mvuŋgay nu ɛ ɛ̀ kɛŋke wvú wvuwɛ wvù nu ɛ shii yî kawla le noo Waa Njee wvun sekecii sɛ ŋka!”

Ɛ nceendaa Nyo' wvu bokaŋ bofɛɛ toŋ ye soŋ, ɛ bó tfume fiɛɛ fimew ɛ ŋguy bɛɛnci yî dvú le, ɛ fí nu diɛwɛ kum wvu baay e. Ɛ fí gbwe ɛ̂ joo yi baay e. Ɛ keba kemwaaŋ ɛnte jo biba bitɛte bi joo yi baay e nɛ tu ɛlɛmɛ.
gufe wvú buy dvú ɛlaante, gɛn no tumte bô ɛta. Ɛ bonyii bò benɛɛ jim nsaw baayɛ bikum bibole, nya ɛ̂ cuwee mvu ɛ bó teŋe lɛ Saul, sɛ no tumte.
Ɛ fí bvuu nu tɛn ɛ bó ɛ saŋ lɛ, “Bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu, ben ebenseè Tata. Bitum bicii, ben ebenseè Tata.”
Mwɛɛm mvunciim nɛ fô wvú le. Mwɛɛm mvunciim fey can ye le, ɛ mwɛɛm mvunciim nu nje ye. Mbense enù fô wvú le sekecii sɛ ŋka. Fí enù nonɛn.
Ɛ ɛkfuŋ buy yuu, ɛ Jon yɛn ɛ Jisos too, ɛ wvú mum gay lɛ, “Ben etaa eyɛn, wvun nu Waa Njee Nyo' wvù cawsee bibefɛ bi yî nshɛ le!

Ɛ̀ to ge fitele fì La'ab wvù to nu kpwoon nsake mvu to lesɛɛ tɛn yî Nyo' le ɛ wvú sɛ boy faŋɛ yaa ekpwe ŋgoo bonyii bobole bo woŋ e bò to tɛmyi bikuu bô bo Nyo' kɛ. Wvú to baa kpwe, njefo bonyii bo Islael to nu ɛ tum bonyii lɛ bó eto eghan ekee woŋ wvudvu, ɛ kpwoon wvudvu fiisɛn bó ɛ̂ wvú yew.
Cooŋ ké no too kɛ keecoŋ lo, bô keeyu lo, noo keebefe lo bô fiɛɛ. Me nto fiem lɛ bonyii ekɛŋkɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu nshii, nshii ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvù nu ɛ loocɛ ɛ yiŋsɛn.
Beene nu fisɛɛbeene bonyii bo woŋ wvu we le. Ɛ ɛ̀ nu fó fô beene looci cɛyte lɛ Mboyse wesebeene wvù Tata Jisos Klistu nu ke enɛ sɛ to.
Ben emum efiisɛn wee tfuu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no Klistu nu ɛ fiisɛn ben, ɛ́ mbense egɛnè ɛ̂ Nyo'.

Joo bó, ɛ́ ben ɛ bó egɛn ekfum bikuu binɛn, ɛ́ wo elaw fiɛɛ ficii fì bó kɛŋke keelaw wvu lɛ bó egɛn emvu bikuu bibole. Ɛ́ wo ge nonɛn, ɛ́ bonyii bocii emum ekiɛɛ lɛ wo gɛɛle tɛn bonci bo Muses e, ɛ mwɛɛm mvunciim mvù bó jemyi ɛkumɛ wo yaa nu kecɛɛy kɛ.
Ɛ wvú nu tɛn icee bonyii bò bó nu ɛ tfuse wase bó yew, ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu kɛ nje bó nu ɛ tfuse bó yew kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu nje bó nu ɛ jo ɛkalɛ kew yî fitele fì wvú to lesɛɛ yî Nyo' le ɛ bó sɛ ke tfuse wvú yew.
No bó bunle nonɛn, mum saŋ ɛdiee ɛbo, jɛm, ɛ di Matiaa le buy gbwe. Ɛ bó mum bise wvú ŋgoo boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e bo yuufe ncow mwaaŋ e.
Wvú to nu ɛ jeme lɛ, “Njoŋ wvu baay nu fô bonyii bò Nyo' nu ɛ lɛɛshɛ wase bojay bobole, ɛ baŋyɛ bibefɛ bibole.
Bonyii bo bofɛɛ ban nu bite bi Olif e bi bifɛɛ noo mwɛɛm mvu mvunfɛɛm mvù bó tomyi bin'yeese yî dvú le mvù ké no leeme fwe dvu Tata wvù kɛŋke nshɛ.
Ben enù bô yii, beelè shiwsè misɛm nɛn wowwowwow. Ben elu bô dikie, ebeelè ɛ ɛ̀ nu kpwe, elu bô njoŋ wvù ben yuuke, esoò ɛ ɛ̀ nu bikuu.
Nsaa yɛm shém, fo wo ebeŋenè fiɛɛ fì befe kɛ. Ɛ̀ beŋenè ɛ ɛ̀ nu fì jee. Wee wvù gee fiɛɛ fì jee nu wee Nyo', ɛ wvù gee fì befe nu ɛ wvú baa kee wase Nyo' kɛ.

Bó to tfuse wvú yew diɛwɛ nciise le keeduŋcɛ lɛ wvú nu wase wee wvu teytey nje fitele fì wvú to lesɛɛ yî Nyo' le seke wvú to bɛɛ ntffuse. Nonɛn Abla'am ɛ mum ɛ no nu icee bonyii bocii bò nu ɛ lese fitele yî Nyo' le ɛ bó baa tfuse bó yew kɛ, wvu lɛ Nyo' ejo tɛn bó lɛ bó nu bonyii bo teytey ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise.
njefo wee ke kpwee tu wvú nu ɛ buy wase can kebefɛ le.
Bese ké no ghane kpwee kɛ kfuu kpwe Jisos sekecii, wvu lɛ nshii Jisos nulo eyen'yi tɛn yî ye yese le.
Me njemyi nɛn, njefo wee nteen kɛŋke shiee ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô ɛkolɛ kew e, yaa taale kɛ ɛkumɛ fiɛɛ fì Jisos Klistu gomte le kɛ.

Ɛ̀ to ge tɛn fitele fì Sɛla to lesɛɛ yî Nyo' le ɛ wvú sɛ kɛŋkɛ mvuŋgay keeleem bô fue ɛ wvú ɛ lun naa wase ɛ fesɛn wvù ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wvú ebvuu eboo. Fí to kooyi nonɛn njefo Sɛla to nu ɛ bee lɛ Nyo' wvù kawɛɛ wvú ké no leeme kɛ yî diɛw ye le.
Ɛ fiɛɛ fì wee wvù tum me shieele nu fin fì lɛ, fo me enlase naa lo wee mwaaŋ fô bonyii bò wvú nu ɛ nya ɛ̂ me le kɛ, geenɛn lɛ me ŋke embvuse lo bó yî kpwe le diuu di fokemɛse.

No bó cim joo nonɛn nu ɛ fô beene le nu ɛ Nyo' mɛy kɛ mwaaŋ. Ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù nu Icee wesebeene wvù to bomɛɛ mwɛɛm mvunciim. Ɛ beene cee ɛ ɛ̀ nu nje ye. Ɛ Cee Ɛkolɛ mɛy kɛ tɛn mwaaŋ wvù ɛ̀ nu Jisos Klistu. Ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù bó to bomɛɛ mwɛɛm mvunciim fele can ye le, ɛ beene kɛŋke tɛn nshii fele yî ye le.

Geenɛn keseen nu ɛ Timatio ɛ to wase ɛ̂ ben e ɛ kase ɛ tu jim fô bese le, ɛ see saaka wvù jee wvu ɛkumɛ fitele fì ben lese yî Klistu le bô no ben duŋci keŋkoŋɛn fô bonyii le. Wvú nu ɛ see tɛn no ben kumyi bese naa ntay bvuu kɛŋke shiee keeyɛn bese le no bese kɛŋke tɛn shiee keeyɛn ben e.
Ɛ́ ben gee nonɛn, ɛ́ Ɛkolɛ ke Boncɛynjee le ke dioo ɛ buynɛn, ɛ́ ben ekɛŋkɛ kefo ke bvukukɛ le kè yaa ké kpwe ncom kɛ.
No bese kee nonɛn sɛ kemaŋɛn, bese ɛ mum ɛ no fewci yaa fane kɛ.

Geenɛn bonyii ban gee mwɛɛm ɛ ɛ̀ nu mvù ɛlɛmɛ kebole gomte diɛwɛ nyám yi ŋkpwaante yì ké no gee mwɛɛm sɛ yí kpwawci lo, ɛ yí nu kɛ lɛ bonyii ke ekooyɛ esɛɛyɛ lo le. Bonyii bodvu ban nu bò nan'yi mwɛɛm sɛ bó kee mvú ŋkuuŋ. Nyo' nu ke elɛse bó kɛ diɛwɛ nyám yi ŋkpwaante yin e,
Kɛ Judas to jemyi nɛn lɛ wen kɛŋke shiee fô bonyii bò fuute le kɛ. Wvú to nu cooŋ ɛ ɛ̀ to nu wvú wee wvubo ɛkɛlɛ, ɛ wvú to ké no leese kebo jó fici ɛkolɛ kew dvú.
No fí nu nonɛn, beene ɛ mum ɛ kiɛɛ, ɛ bee keŋkoŋɛn kè Nyo' kɛŋke fô beene le. Nyo' nu Nyo' keŋkoŋɛn, ɛ wee wvù cee yî keŋkoŋɛn e sekecii, cee ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî Nyo' le, ɛ Nyo' tɛn cee yî ye le sekecii.

Bonyii bò to saaŋkɛnɛɛ no ŋgɛw to kɛwɛɛ seke bó to yuɛ Tɛfan to nu ɛ gɛn mondvuum e mondvuum e, gɛn buy Fonishia, ɛ bomew gɛn Sayblus, bomew Antiok. No bó gɛnɛɛ nonɛn, no fewci diɛw Nyo' ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ ɛ̂ Bojuu maaŋ.
Geenɛn ɛ́ wee cee nce wvù Nyo' gomte bvuu yuuke njoŋ bô fiɛɛ fì wvú kɛŋke, tu ɛ̀ nu naa bvukukɛ bvu baay,
Bó to nu ɛ cinɛ tɛn lɛ yí etum jem bô bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo Nyo' le, eso bó, cinɛ tɛn lɛ yí ekɛŋke mvuŋgay ɛwe jo bontɛw bocii bô bonyii bocii noo bonyii bo díɛw e yicii, noo bitum bicii.
Ɛ́ bó suuŋke wee ɛ wvú ɛ jay fiɛɛ, wvú ɛ no kuule shém, ɛ́ sɛw wvudvu enu la? Geenɛn, ɛ́ wee yɛne ŋgɛw ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî fiɛɛ fì jee le ɛ wvú ɛ ge, wvú ɛ no kuule shém, ɛ́ Nyo' eyuuke njoŋ bô wvú.

Ɛ̀ nɛɛ fiɛɛ fì Klistu nu wee wvù leeme fwe moŋkan mo monfɛm man ɛntelɛŋ jo Nyo' bô wee wvu wum. Ɛ wvú leeme wvu lɛ bonyii bò Nyo' nu ɛ tee lɛ ɛ̀ nu bew ke ekɛŋkɛ bvudvuu fô bvujonkɛ bvù mɛy lo bvù Nyo' nu ɛ kaw bó dvú. Bó nu ke ekɛŋkɛ njefo wee nu ɛ kpwe wase, ɛ kpwe ye yin ɛ sum bó yî ŋgɛw wvù to nu keeke eto nje bibefɛ bì bó to shee gee fwele ɛ̂ moŋkan mo moyvuum e.
No fí nu nonɛn, ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ beene egay lɛ la? Ɛ̀ fɛn nu lɛ beene emɛy egee bibefɛ gɛne dvú fwe fwe wvu lɛ shen Nyo' yì ɛ̀ nu mbuwma fô bonyii le eduule tɛn fesene lo?
Kɛ fí baa ekocɛn naa lo lɛ njeme wvù nyɛne bô njeme keyuŋ, noo yɛle di ɛcici ebuytè dew yene le kɛ. Ben enyaà kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo'.

Lɛ me ntaa, nɛ n'yɛn nyambala mi le ɛ yí yayse lo, ɛ diee di wee wvù ben yî dvú le nu lɛ Kpwe. Ɛ wvumvu wee bii ɛjim ɛ diee nu Woŋboŋkfu. Ɛ bó nya bó bô mvuŋgay lɛ bó ejo bonyii bo yî keba ke nshɛ le kemwaaŋ ɛnte jo binɛw, elɛse bonyii bodvu bô nyó jem noo jeŋ noo kenfim noo nyám yi ŋkpwaante.

Fí ɛ mum ɛ no nu lɛ, ŋkawma wvudvu bii ɛ ɛ̀ nu fitele fì wvú lesɛɛ yî Nyo' le wvu lɛ ɛ́ enu mbuwma ɛ wvú ɛ to fô wvú le, ɛ fiɛɛ fì wvú kawɛɛ fidvu kɛŋke keekooy fô kfuu diew e dicii, ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu kɛ fô bonyii bò leeme yî bonci le maaŋ kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu tɛn fô bonyii bò nu ɛ lese fitele yî Nyo' le lɛŋlɛŋ no Abla'am to lesɛɛ, njefo Abla'am nu icee wesebeene bocii bò nu bonyii bo Nyo' le.
Ɛ bonyii bo Lum bodvu ke dioo tasse nsaw wɛm, faŋɛ yaa yɛn fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó eyu me yî dvú le kɛ. Ɛ bó mum no gomte keecinɛ me le,
Nonɛn kɛ Nyo' cawte wee bii no wee wvu wum kooŋke, kɛnɛɛ yî lemme dì wee lem e kɛ. Wvú cawte ɛ ɛ̀ nu nje wvú kɛŋke shen fô bonyii le.
Fo beene ejaaŋkè kenjaŋ no bó bomew to jaaŋke, ɛ Nyo' ge ɛ bó kpwekɛn bontfuke mbaanfiɛɛ ncow botɛte (23,000) yî diuu dimwaaŋ e kɛ.
Geenɛn ɛ me nɛn'yi n'yɛne wvumvu nci le ɛ wvú nu yî yɛm e. Ɛ wvuwɛ tumte jem bô nci wvù kɛŋke ŋkpwawcɛ wɛm, gee ɛ me ntuu nfwa wvuwɛ nci wvu kebefɛ wvù nu yî yɛm e.

No fí nu nonɛn, beene emum ecinɛ n'yɛɛyi wvu ɛkumɛ Klistu wvù wee ké yaw kɛw yɛɛyi le, egɛnè fwe ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî wvu bonyii bò nu ɛ taw wase le. Fo beene ebvuu ekɛw eleesè kenffuy ke n'yɛɛyi le kè lɛ bonyii ekumɛn mvuntelem mvubole yî gee dibole dì nulo etoo bô kpwe, noo n'yɛɛyi wvù lɛ bonyii elese fitele yî Nyo' le kɛ.
Fo wee ejo wvú ɛkuse kɛ. Ben ke eficɛ wvú ɛ́ wvú elɛn nyɛkeey etu jim fô me le, njefo bee boom bo bwee wesebeene le cɛyte wvú.
Boom bo bwɛɛm e, ɛ́ wee nɛ ɛ no duu lɛ wen nu ɛ lese fitele yî Nyo' le, ɛ gee diew yaa duŋci nonɛn kɛ, ɛ́ fifiɛ ke efi wvú yî la le? Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ fitele fì wvú lese fidvu ke eboyse wvú?
Ɛ bonyii bo Jɛlusalɛm bomew mum nɛ bife lɛ, “Wvun nu kɛ wee wvù bó gomte lɛ bó eyu?
No wvú gay nonɛn, mum yoy yî bó le gay lɛ, “Ben efiisɛn Keyoy ke Yuule.

No bó baa kee je yì Nyo' joo lɛ wee ké no nu teytey ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise jó, bó ɛ mum ɛ no gomte wase keegɛɛ yibo je, ɛ faŋɛ yaa bvuu nya bikuu bibole keebii yiyɛ je yì Nyo' joo lɛ wee nu teytey ɛ̂ wvú ɛjisɛ jó le kɛ.

Wee wvù nu ɛ bee Waa Nyo' le nu ɛ wvú kɛŋke fiɛɛ fì Nyo' jeme fin yî ye le. Wee wvù baa bee Nyo' le nu ɛ wvú gee ɛ Nyo' nu wee mbiay, njefo wvú baa bee fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ jeme Nyo' ɛ̂ beene ɛkumɛ Waa we le kɛ.
Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy kecɛɛy lɛ wee wvù nu ɛ lese fitele yî yɛm e nu ke egee tɛn dilemme dì me ŋgee. Ɛ wvú nu ke ege dilemme efey naa dì me nu ɛ ŋge, njefo me ŋgɛne wase fô Icɛm e.
Ɛ̀ teetè bonfaw lɛ bó enya bikuu bibole ɛ̂ bonyii bò kɛŋke bó, egeè fiɛɛ ficii no bó gomte lɛ bó egeè. Fo bó etfuusè fiɛɛ dew yibole kɛ.
Ben eyɛnè fo wee mvu ke ejim keekɛŋkɛ mbuwma Nyo', ebvuu eyɛnè tɛn fo ŋgow mi yì befe ke enɛ ebuy ɛ̂ ben ɛntelɛŋ ke eto bô ŋgɛw ejiŋ bonyii nteen.
Wvú kɛŋke tɛn keenu wee wvù bonyii bo ɛkfuŋ yɛne tɛn lɛ ɛ̀ nu wee wvu lɛŋ. Ɛfuw kɛ nonɛn, ɛ́ wvú ke enɛ ejo ɛ̂ ketam ke dɛwle le eshoose ɛkolɛ kew.
Fí nu tɛn lɛ Klistu nu ɛ buw kɛ wee mwaaŋ mwaaŋ beene le ɛ nya wvú bô ye nnya bii nfew we le ɛ̂ mwɛtɛn.
Ɛ nceendaa Nyo' wvu bokaŋ bofɛɛ tfuw kew kentee ɛ̂ joo yi baay e, ɛ joo yidvu baŋke no nu diɛwɛ ɛlɛmɛ ke keŋkpwe ke wee le. Ɛ fiɛɛ ficii fì to cee ɛ̂ joo yidvu le kpwe.
Fo ben egeè nonɛn kɛ seke jise dibole nu yî yene le wvu lɛ ye ejeè bó kɛ. Ben egeè ɛ ɛ̀ nu diɛwɛ bonfaw bo Klistu le bò gee ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì Nyo' gomte bô mvuntelem mvubole mvunciim.
Fo ben egeè fiɛɛ fì nɛlo esaake ben fô fitele le kɛ, wvu lɛ ɛ́ bó nan'yi ben, jemyi díɛw yì befe ɛkumɛ keŋge kenɛn kè jee nje ben nu bonyii bo Klistu le, ɛ́ bó ewuumene.
Ben ekeè lɛ fiɛɛ fì Icɛm shieele nu fin fì lɛ wee tfuu wvù nu ɛ yɛn Waa we le, ɛ lese fitele yî ye le, nu ke ekɛŋkɛ nshii wvù mɛy lo, ɛ me nu ŋke embvuse mwɛtɛn yî kpwe le diuu di fokemɛse.”
Kaŋ mwaaŋ, ɛ nceendaa Tata mum tum kencɛm yî Nfon 'Ɛlod e, njefo wvú to baa efese mbense wvudvu ɛ̂ Nyo' kɛ. Ɛ ŋgeŋse mum die wvú, ɛ wvú kpwe.
Mbense enù fô Nyo' wvù ɛ̀ nu Nyo' wvu Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos Klistu, bvuu nu Ice le. Wvú nu Icee shen, nu Nyo' wvù lɛɛse mvuntelem mvu bonyii le yî mwɛɛm e mvunciim.
Bonyii bomew nu ɛ cinɛ wase yiyin je le ɛ no bvuyte gɛne wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî bonjeme bo ɛcici le.

Ben ekeè lɛ kɛ me ŋ'wuumene fiɛɛ fi ɛkumɛ saaka wvù jee wvù wvu Nyo' kɛ. Me ŋkee lo lɛ ɛ̀ nu fô mvuŋgay mvu Nyo' le keeboyse wee tfuu wvù nu ɛ lese fitele yî ye le nu. Ɛ saaka wvun yaake gɛne ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô Bojuu le sɛ gɛne tɛn fô bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu le.
Ben ekeè lɛ kenffuy mɛy kɛ kè bó to nu ɛ lese wase kè ɛ̀ nu Jisos Klistu, ɛ kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wee ebvuu elese kemew kɛ.
Naa no me ncim njemyi nɛn, wee mwaaŋ mwaaŋ ben e kɛŋke keekooŋkè kpwɛse no wvú kooŋke ɛkolɛ kew, ɛ́ kpwoon tɛn eyɛn lɛ wen enyaà n'wvum ɛ̂ dweese.

Ben to shee nu ɛ ben ɛ kpwe wase ɛ̂ keyoy e nje bonci bo Nyo' le bò ben to ŋgoyte ɛ Klistu baa tfuse wase tɛn ben yew keesum mwɛɛm mvù nyam ye yene gomte le kɛ. Keseen, Nyo' nu ɛ ge wase ben ɛ kase ɛ tu dvú, ɛ taashɛ ben ɛ bo Klistu. Wvú nu ɛ lɛɛshɛ wase bibefɛ bisɛɛbeene bicii.
Fo wo elaŋ nnya yo kɛ. Nnya yin nu yì bó to nyaɛ ɛ̂ wo seke ŋgoo bocee bikuu bi kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le to gɛɛlɛɛ can yibo yî yo le jemyi ɛ̂ wo we diɛwɛ bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le.
Ɛ me nɛ n'yɛn wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛbulɛ ke kefɛ bô nshɛ yi fiɛ le, njefo ɛbulɛ ke keyvuum bô nshɛ yi yvum to nu ɛ la wase, ɛ joo yi baay tɛn yaa bɛɛ kɛ.
Ben elaŋlaŋè sekecii,
Yî kee yi yitin yin e nu ɛ bonyii nu ke egomte kpwe yaa yɛne yí le kɛ. Bó nu ke ebeele keekpwe, ɛ kpwe lewte lo bó.
Beene nu ɛ bee lɛ Jisos to nu ɛ kpwe kase buy yî kpwe le, ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no Nyo' nu ke ekase etfuse jim bonyii bò to kpwekene ɛ bó ɛ taashɛ bô bo Jisos, ɛ́ bó ke enu bô wvú.
Ɛ́ ɛ̀ nu naa yɛɛ wvù jeme bô diuw we lɛ Jisos nu Waa Nyo', tu Nyo' nu yî mwɛtɛn e sekecii ɛ wvú nu tɛn yî Nyo' le.
Ben emum ebaa ye yi yvum yì ben to cee nce wvu yvum dvú yì nu ɛ befe wase nje mwɛɛm mvu nnyɛn e mvù ben to shee gee.
Ɛ̀ nu me diuw ketaaŋ. Ɛ́ wee fey yî yɛm e ɛ sɛ ley, ɛ́ wvú ke eboy. Wvú nu ke enu diɛwɛ njee yì buyte gɛne diekene kaase tuu jim ɛ̂ ketaaŋ e.

Ɛ bomew nu ɛ bó to tumyɛ bô ɛta ɛ bó kpwekɛn, bvuu tan'yi bomew bô nyó yì bó tane bite dvú ɛ bó buyte biba bifɛɛ bifɛɛ, gbwoci bomew bô nyó jem ɛ bó kpwekene. Bomew to ghane jiise ɛ ɛ̀ nu jéw njée bô yi bíe. Bó to nu bonyii bo kefufe le, ɛ bonyii njiŋsene bô bó bvuu nyɛwle bô bó.
Ɛ́ ben kee lo lɛ wvú nu wee wvù gee mwɛɛm teytey, tu ben kɛŋke keekeè tɛn lɛ wee tfuu wvù gee fiɛɛ fi teytey nu ɛ ɛ̀ nu mboo we.
